53* GEMM *

55
56static void
57GEMM_CopyBlock( const uchar* src, size_t src_step,
58 uchar* dst, size_t dst_step,
59 Size size, size_t pix_size )
60{
61 int j;
62 size.width *= (int)(pix_size / sizeof(int));
63
64 for( ; size.height--; src += src_step, dst += dst_step )
65 {
66 j=0;
67 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
68 for( ; j <= size.width - 4; j += 4 )
69 {
70 int t0 = ((const int*)src)[j];
71 int t1 = ((const int*)src)[j+1];
72 ((int*)dst)[j] = t0;
73 ((int*)dst)[j+1] = t1;
74 t0 = ((const int*)src)[j+2];
75 t1 = ((const int*)src)[j+3];
76 ((int*)dst)[j+2] = t0;
77 ((int*)dst)[j+3] = t1;
78 }
79 #endif
80 for( ; j < size.width; j++ )
81 ((int*)dst)[j] = ((const int*)src)[j];
82 }
83}
84
85
86static void
87GEMM_TransposeBlock( const uchar* src, size_t src_step,
88 uchar* dst, size_t dst_step,
89 Size size, size_t pix_size )
90{
91 int i, j;
92 for( i = 0; i < size.width; i++, dst += dst_step, src += pix_size )
93 {
94 const uchar* _src = src;
95 switch( pix_size )
96 {
97 case sizeof(int):
98 for( j = 0; j < size.height; j++, _src += src_step )
99 ((int*)dst)[j] = ((int*)_src)[0];
100 break;
101 case sizeof(int)*2:
102 for( j = 0; j < size.height*2; j += 2, _src += src_step )
103 {
104 int t0 = ((int*)_src)[0];
105 int t1 = ((int*)_src)[1];
106 ((int*)dst)[j] = t0;
107 ((int*)dst)[j+1] = t1;
108 }
109 break;
110 case sizeof(int)*4:
111 for( j = 0; j < size.height*4; j += 4, _src += src_step )
112 {
113 int t0 = ((int*)_src)[0];
114 int t1 = ((int*)_src)[1];
115 ((int*)dst)[j] = t0;
116 ((int*)dst)[j+1] = t1;
117 t0 = ((int*)_src)[2];
118 t1 = ((int*)_src)[3];
119 ((int*)dst)[j+2] = t0;
120 ((int*)dst)[j+3] = t1;
121 }
122 break;
123 default:
124 assert(0);
125 return;
126 }
127 }
128}
129
130
131template<typename T, typename WT> static void
132GEMMSingleMul( const T* a_data, size_t a_step,
133 const T* b_data, size_t b_step,
134 const T* c_data, size_t c_step,
135 T* d_data, size_t d_step,
136 Size a_size, Size d_size,
137 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
138{
139 int i, j, k, n = a_size.width, m = d_size.width, drows = d_size.height;
140 const T *_a_data = a_data, *_b_data = b_data, *_c_data = c_data;
141 cv::AutoBuffer<T> _a_buf;
142 T* a_buf = 0;
143 size_t a_step0, a_step1, c_step0, c_step1, t_step;
144
145 a_step /= sizeof(a_data[0]);
146 b_step /= sizeof(b_data[0]);
147 c_step /= sizeof(c_data[0]);
148 d_step /= sizeof(d_data[0]);
149 a_step0 = a_step;
150 a_step1 = 1;
151
152 if( !c_data )
153 c_step0 = c_step1 = 0;
154 else if( !(flags & GEMM_3_T) )
155 c_step0 = c_step, c_step1 = 1;
156 else
157 c_step0 = 1, c_step1 = c_step;
158
159 if( flags & GEMM_1_T )
160 {
161 CV_SWAP( a_step0, a_step1, t_step );
162 n = a_size.height;
163 if( a_step > 1 && n > 1 )
164 {
165 _a_buf.allocate(n);
166 a_buf = _a_buf;
167 }
168 }
169
170 if( n == 1 ) /* external product */
171 {
172 cv::AutoBuffer<T> _b_buf;
173 T* b_buf = 0;
174
175 if( a_step > 1 && a_size.height > 1 )
176 {
177 _a_buf.allocate(drows);
178 a_buf = _a_buf;
179 for( k = 0; k < drows; k++ )
180 a_buf[k] = a_data[a_step*k];
181 a_data = a_buf;
182 }
183
184 if( b_step > 1 )
185 {
186 _b_buf.allocate(d_size.width);
187 b_buf = _b_buf;
188 for( j = 0; j < d_size.width; j++ )
189 b_buf[j] = b_data[j*b_step];
190 b_data = b_buf;
191 }
192
193 for( i = 0; i < drows; i++, _c_data += c_step0, d_data += d_step )
194 {
195 WT al = WT(a_data[i])*alpha;
196 c_data = _c_data;
197 for( j = 0; j <= d_size.width - 2; j += 2, c_data += 2*c_step1 )
198 {
199 WT s0 = al*WT(b_data[j]);
200 WT s1 = al*WT(b_data[j+1]);
201 if( !c_data )
202 {
203 d_data[j] = T(s0);
204 d_data[j+1] = T(s1);
205 }
206 else
207 {
208 d_data[j] = T(s0 + WT(c_data[0])*beta);
209 d_data[j+1] = T(s1 + WT(c_data[c_step1])*beta);
210 }
211 }
212
213 for( ; j < d_size.width; j++, c_data += c_step1 )
214 {
215 WT s0 = al*WT(b_data[j]);
216 if( !c_data )
217 d_data[j] = T(s0);
218 else
219 d_data[j] = T(s0 + WT(c_data[0])*beta);
220 }
221 }
222 }
223 else if( flags & GEMM_2_T ) /* A * Bt */
224 {
225 for( i = 0; i < drows; i++, _a_data += a_step0, _c_data += c_step0, d_data += d_step )
226 {
227 a_data = _a_data;
228 b_data = _b_data;
229 c_data = _c_data;
230
231 if( a_buf )
232 {
233 for( k = 0; k < n; k++ )
234 a_buf[k] = a_data[a_step1*k];
235 a_data = a_buf;
236 }
237
238 for( j = 0; j < d_size.width; j++, b_data += b_step,
239 c_data += c_step1 )
240 {
241 WT s0(0), s1(0), s2(0), s3(0);
242 k = 0;
243 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
244 for( ; k <= n - 4; k += 4 )
245 {
246 s0 += WT(a_data[k])*WT(b_data[k]);
247 s1 += WT(a_data[k+1])*WT(b_data[k+1]);
248 s2 += WT(a_data[k+2])*WT(b_data[k+2]);
249 s3 += WT(a_data[k+3])*WT(b_data[k+3]);
250 }
251 #endif
252 for( ; k < n; k++ )
253 s0 += WT(a_data[k])*WT(b_data[k]);
254 s0 = (s0+s1+s2+s3)*alpha;
255
256 if( !c_data )
257 d_data[j] = T(s0);
258 else
259 d_data[j] = T(s0 + WT(c_data[0])*beta);
260 }
261 }
262 }
263 else if( d_size.width*sizeof(d_data[0]) <= 1600 )
264 {
265 for( i = 0; i < drows; i++, _a_data += a_step0,
266 _c_data += c_step0,
267 d_data += d_step )
268 {
269 a_data = _a_data, c_data = _c_data;
270
271 if( a_buf )
272 {
273 for( k = 0; k < n; k++ )
274 a_buf[k] = a_data[a_step1*k];
275 a_data = a_buf;
276 }
277
278 for( j = 0; j <= m - 4; j += 4, c_data += 4*c_step1 )
279 {
280 const T* b = _b_data + j;
281 WT s0(0), s1(0), s2(0), s3(0);
282
283 for( k = 0; k < n; k++, b += b_step )
284 {
285 WT a(a_data[k]);
286 s0 += a * WT(b[0]); s1 += a * WT(b[1]);
287 s2 += a * WT(b[2]); s3 += a * WT(b[3]);
288 }
289
290 if( !c_data )
291 {
292 d_data[j] = T(s0*alpha);
293 d_data[j+1] = T(s1*alpha);
294 d_data[j+2] = T(s2*alpha);
295 d_data[j+3] = T(s3*alpha);
296 }
297 else
298 {
299 s0 = s0*alpha; s1 = s1*alpha;
300 s2 = s2*alpha; s3 = s3*alpha;
301 d_data[j] = T(s0 + WT(c_data[0])*beta);
302 d_data[j+1] = T(s1 + WT(c_data[c_step1])*beta);
303 d_data[j+2] = T(s2 + WT(c_data[c_step1*2])*beta);
304 d_data[j+3] = T(s3 + WT(c_data[c_step1*3])*beta);
305 }
306 }
307
308 for( ; j < m; j++, c_data += c_step1 )
309 {
310 const T* b = _b_data + j;
311 WT s0(0);
312
313 for( k = 0; k < n; k++, b += b_step )
314 s0 += WT(a_data[k]) * WT(b[0]);
315
316 s0 = s0*alpha;
317 if( !c_data )
318 d_data[j] = T(s0);
319 else
320 d_data[j] = T(s0 + WT(c_data[0])*beta);
321 }
322 }
323 }
324 else
325 {
326 cv::AutoBuffer<WT> _d_buf(m);
327 WT* d_buf = _d_buf;
328
329 for( i = 0; i < drows; i++, _a_data += a_step0, _c_data += c_step0, d_data += d_step )
330 {
331 a_data = _a_data;
332 b_data = _b_data;
333 c_data = _c_data;
334
335 if( a_buf )
336 {
337 for( k = 0; k < n; k++ )
338 a_buf[k] = _a_data[a_step1*k];
339 a_data = a_buf;
340 }
341
342 for( j = 0; j < m; j++ )
343 d_buf[j] = WT(0);
344
345 for( k = 0; k < n; k++, b_data += b_step )
346 {
347 WT al(a_data[k]);
348 j=0;
349 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
350 for(; j <= m - 4; j += 4 )
351 {
352 WT t0 = d_buf[j] + WT(b_data[j])*al;
353 WT t1 = d_buf[j+1] + WT(b_data[j+1])*al;
354 d_buf[j] = t0;
355 d_buf[j+1] = t1;
356 t0 = d_buf[j+2] + WT(b_data[j+2])*al;
357 t1 = d_buf[j+3] + WT(b_data[j+3])*al;
358 d_buf[j+2] = t0;
359 d_buf[j+3] = t1;
360 }
361 #endif
362 for( ; j < m; j++ )
363 d_buf[j] += WT(b_data[j])*al;
364 }
365
366 if( !c_data )
367 for( j = 0; j < m; j++ )
368 d_data[j] = T(d_buf[j]*alpha);
369 else
370 for( j = 0; j < m; j++, c_data += c_step1 )
371 {
372 WT t = d_buf[j]*alpha;
373 d_data[j] = T(t + WT(c_data[0])*beta);
374 }
375 }
376 }
377}
378
379
380template<typename T, typename WT> static void
381GEMMBlockMul( const T* a_data, size_t a_step,
382 const T* b_data, size_t b_step,
383 WT* d_data, size_t d_step,
384 Size a_size, Size d_size, int flags )
385{
386 int i, j, k, n = a_size.width, m = d_size.width;
387 const T *_a_data = a_data, *_b_data = b_data;
388 cv::AutoBuffer<T> _a_buf;
389 T* a_buf = 0;
390 size_t a_step0, a_step1, t_step;
391 int do_acc = flags & 16;
392
393 a_step /= sizeof(a_data[0]);
394 b_step /= sizeof(b_data[0]);
395 d_step /= sizeof(d_data[0]);
396
397 a_step0 = a_step;
398 a_step1 = 1;
399
400 if( flags & GEMM_1_T )
401 {
402 CV_SWAP( a_step0, a_step1, t_step );
403 n = a_size.height;
404 _a_buf.allocate(n);
405 a_buf = _a_buf;
406 }
407
408 if( flags & GEMM_2_T )
409 {
410 /* second operand is transposed */
411 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, _a_data += a_step0, d_data += d_step )
412 {
413 a_data = _a_data; b_data = _b_data;
414
415 if( a_buf )
416 {
417 for( k = 0; k < n; k++ )
418 a_buf[k] = a_data[a_step1*k];
419 a_data = a_buf;
420 }
421
422 for( j = 0; j < d_size.width; j++, b_data += b_step )
423 {
424 WT s0 = do_acc ? d_data[j]:WT(0), s1(0);
425 for( k = 0; k <= n - 2; k += 2 )
426 {
427 s0 += WT(a_data[k])*WT(b_data[k]);
428 s1 += WT(a_data[k+1])*WT(b_data[k+1]);
429 }
430
431 for( ; k < n; k++ )
432 s0 += WT(a_data[k])*WT(b_data[k]);
433
434 d_data[j] = s0 + s1;
435 }
436 }
437 }
438 else
439 {
440 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, _a_data += a_step0, d_data += d_step )
441 {
442 a_data = _a_data, b_data = _b_data;
443
444 if( a_buf )
445 {
446 for( k = 0; k < n; k++ )
447 a_buf[k] = a_data[a_step1*k];
448 a_data = a_buf;
449 }
450
451 for( j = 0; j <= m - 4; j += 4 )
452 {
453 WT s0, s1, s2, s3;
454 const T* b = b_data + j;
455
456 if( do_acc )
457 {
458 s0 = d_data[j]; s1 = d_data[j+1];
459 s2 = d_data[j+2]; s3 = d_data[j+3];
460 }
461 else
462 s0 = s1 = s2 = s3 = WT(0);
463
464 for( k = 0; k < n; k++, b += b_step )
465 {
466 WT a(a_data[k]);
467 s0 += a * WT(b[0]); s1 += a * WT(b[1]);
468 s2 += a * WT(b[2]); s3 += a * WT(b[3]);
469 }
470
471 d_data[j] = s0; d_data[j+1] = s1;
472 d_data[j+2] = s2; d_data[j+3] = s3;
473 }
474
475 for( ; j < m; j++ )
476 {
477 const T* b = b_data + j;
478 WT s0 = do_acc ? d_data[j] : WT(0);
479
480 for( k = 0; k < n; k++, b += b_step )
481 s0 += WT(a_data[k]) * WT(b[0]);
482
483 d_data[j] = s0;
484 }
485 }
486 }
487}
488
489
490template<typename T, typename WT> static void
491GEMMStore( const T* c_data, size_t c_step,
492 const WT* d_buf, size_t d_buf_step,
493 T* d_data, size_t d_step, Size d_size,
494 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
495{
496 const T* _c_data = c_data;
497 int j;
498 size_t c_step0, c_step1;
499
500 c_step /= sizeof(c_data[0]);
501 d_buf_step /= sizeof(d_buf[0]);
502 d_step /= sizeof(d_data[0]);
503
504 if( !c_data )
505 c_step0 = c_step1 = 0;
506 else if( !(flags & GEMM_3_T) )
507 c_step0 = c_step, c_step1 = 1;
508 else
509 c_step0 = 1, c_step1 = c_step;
510
511 for( ; d_size.height--; _c_data += c_step0, d_buf += d_buf_step, d_data += d_step )
512 {
513 if( _c_data )
514 {
515 c_data = _c_data;
516 j=0;
517 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
518 for(; j <= d_size.width - 4; j += 4, c_data += 4*c_step1 )
519 {
520 WT t0 = alpha*d_buf[j];
521 WT t1 = alpha*d_buf[j+1];
522 t0 += beta*WT(c_data[0]);
523 t1 += beta*WT(c_data[c_step1]);
524 d_data[j] = T(t0);
525 d_data[j+1] = T(t1);
526 t0 = alpha*d_buf[j+2];
527 t1 = alpha*d_buf[j+3];
528 t0 += beta*WT(c_data[c_step1*2]);
529 t1 += beta*WT(c_data[c_step1*3]);
530 d_data[j+2] = T(t0);
531 d_data[j+3] = T(t1);
532 }
533 #endif
534 for( ; j < d_size.width; j++, c_data += c_step1 )
535 {
536 WT t0 = alpha*d_buf[j];
537 d_data[j] = T(t0 + WT(c_data[0])*beta);
538 }
539 }
540 else
541 {
542 j = 0;
543 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
544 for( ; j <= d_size.width - 4; j += 4 )
545 {
546 WT t0 = alpha*d_buf[j];
547 WT t1 = alpha*d_buf[j+1];
548 d_data[j] = T(t0);
549 d_data[j+1] = T(t1);
550 t0 = alpha*d_buf[j+2];
551 t1 = alpha*d_buf[j+3];
552 d_data[j+2] = T(t0);
553 d_data[j+3] = T(t1);
554 }
555 #endif
556 for( ; j < d_size.width; j++ )
557 d_data[j] = T(alpha*d_buf[j]);
558 }
559 }
560}
561
562
563typedef void (*GEMMSingleMulFunc)( const void* src1, size_t step1,
564 const void* src2, size_t step2, const void* src3, size_t step3,
565 void* dst, size_t dststep, Size srcsize, Size dstsize,
566 double alpha, double beta, int flags );
567
568typedef void (*GEMMBlockMulFunc)( const void* src1, size_t step1,
569 const void* src2, size_t step2, void* dst, size_t dststep,
570 Size srcsize, Size dstsize, int flags );
571
572typedef void (*GEMMStoreFunc)( const void* src1, size_t step1,
573 const void* src2, size_t step2, void* dst, size_t dststep,
574 Size dstsize, double alpha, double beta, int flags );
575
576static void GEMMSingleMul_32f( const float* a_data, size_t a_step,
577 const float* b_data, size_t b_step,
578 const float* c_data, size_t c_step,
579 float* d_data, size_t d_step,
580 Size a_size, Size d_size,
581 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
582{
583 GEMMSingleMul<float,double>(a_data, a_step, b_data, b_step, c_data,
584 c_step, d_data, d_step, a_size, d_size,
585 alpha, beta, flags);
586}
587
588static void GEMMSingleMul_64f( const double* a_data, size_t a_step,
589 const double* b_data, size_t b_step,
590 const double* c_data, size_t c_step,
591 double* d_data, size_t d_step,
592 Size a_size, Size d_size,
593 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
594{
595 GEMMSingleMul<double,double>(a_data, a_step, b_data, b_step, c_data,
596 c_step, d_data, d_step, a_size, d_size,
597 alpha, beta, flags);
598}

601static void GEMMSingleMul_32fc( const Complexf* a_data, size_t a_step,
602 const Complexf* b_data, size_t b_step,
603 const Complexf* c_data, size_t c_step,
604 Complexf* d_data, size_t d_step,
605 Size a_size, Size d_size,
606 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
607{
608 GEMMSingleMul<Complexf,Complexd>(a_data, a_step, b_data, b_step, c_data,
609 c_step, d_data, d_step, a_size, d_size,
610 alpha, beta, flags);
611}

613static void GEMMSingleMul_64fc( const Complexd* a_data, size_t a_step,
614 const Complexd* b_data, size_t b_step,
615 const Complexd* c_data, size_t c_step,
616 Complexd* d_data, size_t d_step,
617 Size a_size, Size d_size,
618 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
619{
620 GEMMSingleMul<Complexd,Complexd>(a_data, a_step, b_data, b_step, c_data,
621 c_step, d_data, d_step, a_size, d_size,
622 alpha, beta, flags);
623}

626 const float* b_data, size_t b_step,
627 double* d_data, size_t d_step,
628 Size a_size, Size d_size, int flags )

631}

642
643static void GEMMBlockMul_32fc( const Complexf* a_data, size_t a_step,
644 const Complexf* b_data, size_t b_step,
645 Complexd* d_data, size_t d_step,
646 Size a_size, Size d_size, int flags )
647{
648 GEMMBlockMul(a_data, a_step, b_data, b_step, d_data, d_step, a_size, d_size, flags);
649}
650
651
652static void GEMMBlockMul_64fc( const Complexd* a_data, size_t a_step,
653 const Complexd* b_data, size_t b_step,
654 Complexd* d_data, size_t d_step,
655 Size a_size, Size d_size, int flags )
656{
657 GEMMBlockMul(a_data, a_step, b_data, b_step, d_data, d_step, a_size, d_size, flags);
658}
659
660
661static void GEMMStore_32f( const float* c_data, size_t c_step,
662 const double* d_buf, size_t d_buf_step,
663 float* d_data, size_t d_step, Size d_size,
664 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
665{
666 GEMMStore(c_data, c_step, d_buf, d_buf_step, d_data, d_step, d_size, alpha, beta, flags);
667}
668
669
670static void GEMMStore_64f( const double* c_data, size_t c_step,
671 const double* d_buf, size_t d_buf_step,
672 double* d_data, size_t d_step, Size d_size,
673 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
674{
675 GEMMStore(c_data, c_step, d_buf, d_buf_step, d_data, d_step, d_size, alpha, beta, flags);
676}
677
678
679static void GEMMStore_32fc( const Complexf* c_data, size_t c_step,
680 const Complexd* d_buf, size_t d_buf_step,
681 Complexf* d_data, size_t d_step, Size d_size,
682 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
683{
684 GEMMStore(c_data, c_step, d_buf, d_buf_step, d_data, d_step, d_size, alpha, beta, flags);
685}
686
687
688static void GEMMStore_64fc( const Complexd* c_data, size_t c_step,
689 const Complexd* d_buf, size_t d_buf_step,
690 Complexd* d_data, size_t d_step, Size d_size,
691 double alpha, double beta, int flags )
692{
693 GEMMStore(c_data, c_step, d_buf, d_buf_step, d_data, d_step, d_size, alpha, beta, flags);
694}
695
696}
697
698void cv::gemm( InputArray matA, InputArray matB, double alpha,
699 InputArray matC, double beta, OutputArray _matD, int flags )
700{
701 const int block_lin_size = 128;
702 const int block_size = block_lin_size * block_lin_size;
703
704 static double zero[] = {0,0,0,0};
705 static float zerof[] = {0,0,0,0};
706
707 Mat A = matA.getMat(), B = matB.getMat(), C = beta != 0 ? matC.getMat() : Mat();
708 Size a_size = A.size(), d_size;
709 int i, len = 0, type = A.type();
710
711 CV_Assert( type == B.type() && (type == CV_32FC1 || type == CV_64FC1 || type == CV_32FC2 || type == CV_64FC2) );
712
713 switch( flags & (GEMM_1_T|GEMM_2_T) )
714 {
715 case 0:
716 d_size = Size( B.cols, a_size.height );
717 len = B.rows;
718 CV_Assert( a_size.width == len );
719 break;
720 case 1:
721 d_size = Size( B.cols, a_size.width );
722 len = B.rows;
723 CV_Assert( a_size.height == len );
724 break;
725 case 2:
726 d_size = Size( B.rows, a_size.height );
727 len = B.cols;
728 CV_Assert( a_size.width == len );
729 break;
730 case 3:
731 d_size = Size( B.rows, a_size.width );
732 len = B.cols;
733 CV_Assert( a_size.height == len );
734 break;
735 }
736
737 if( C.data )
738 {
739 CV_Assert( C.type() == type &&
740 (((flags&GEMM_3_T) == 0 && C.rows == d_size.height && C.cols == d_size.width) ||
741 ((flags&GEMM_3_T) != 0 && C.rows == d_size.width && C.cols == d_size.height)));
742 }
743
744 _matD.create( d_size.height, d_size.width, type );
745 Mat D = _matD.getMat();
746 if( (flags & GEMM_3_T) != 0 && C.data == D.data )
747 {
748 transpose( C, C );
749 flags &= ~GEMM_3_T;
750 }
751
752 if( flags == 0 && 2 <= len && len <= 4 && (len == d_size.width || len == d_size.height) )
753 {
754 if( type == CV_32F )
755 {
756 float* d = (float*)D.data;
757 const float *a = (const float*)A.data,
758 *b = (const float*)B.data,
759 *c = (const float*)C.data;
760 size_t d_step = D.step/sizeof(d[0]),
761 a_step = A.step/sizeof(a[0]),
762 b_step = B.step/sizeof(b[0]),
763 c_step = C.data ? C.step/sizeof(c[0]) : 0;
764
765 if( !c )
766 c = zerof;
767
768 switch( len )
769 {
770 case 2:
771 if( len == d_size.width && b != d )
772 {
773 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, d += d_step, a += a_step, c += c_step )
774 {
775 float t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step];
776 float t1 = a[0]*b[1] + a[1]*b[b_step+1];
777 d[0] = (float)(t0*alpha + c[0]*beta);
778 d[1] = (float)(t1*alpha + c[1]*beta);
779 }
780 }
781 else if( a != d )
782 {
783 int c_step0 = 1;
784 if( c == zerof )
785 {
786 c_step0 = 0;
787 c_step = 1;
788 }
789
790 for( i = 0; i < d_size.width; i++, d++, b++, c += c_step0 )
791 {
792 float t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step];
793 float t1 = a[a_step]*b[0] + a[a_step+1]*b[b_step];
794 d[0] = (float)(t0*alpha + c[0]*beta);
795 d[d_step] = (float)(t1*alpha + c[c_step]*beta);
796 }
797 }
798 else
799 break;
800 return;
801 case 3:
802 if( len == d_size.width && b != d )
803 {
804 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, d += d_step, a += a_step, c += c_step )
805 {
806 float t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2];
807 float t1 = a[0]*b[1] + a[1]*b[b_step+1] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+1];
808 float t2 = a[0]*b[2] + a[1]*b[b_step+2] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+2];
809 d[0] = (float)(t0*alpha + c[0]*beta);
810 d[1] = (float)(t1*alpha + c[1]*beta);
811 d[2] = (float)(t2*alpha + c[2]*beta);
812 }
813 }
814 else if( a != d )
815 {
816 int c_step0 = 1;
817 if( c == zerof )
818 {
819 c_step0 = 0;
820 c_step = 1;
821 }
822
823 for( i = 0; i < d_size.width; i++, d++, b++, c += c_step0 )
824 {
825 float t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2];
826 float t1 = a[a_step]*b[0] + a[a_step+1]*b[b_step] + a[a_step+2]*b[b_step*2];
827 float t2 = a[a_step*2]*b[0] + a[a_step*2+1]*b[b_step] + a[a_step*2+2]*b[b_step*2];
828
829 d[0] = (float)(t0*alpha + c[0]*beta);
830 d[d_step] = (float)(t1*alpha + c[c_step]*beta);
831 d[d_step*2] = (float)(t2*alpha + c[c_step*2]*beta);
832 }
833 }
834 else
835 break;
836 return;
837 case 4:
838 if( len == d_size.width && b != d )
839 {
840 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, d += d_step, a += a_step, c += c_step )
841 {
842 float t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2] + a[3]*b[b_step*3];
843 float t1 = a[0]*b[1] + a[1]*b[b_step+1] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+1] + a[3]*b[b_step*3+1];
844 float t2 = a[0]*b[2] + a[1]*b[b_step+2] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+2] + a[3]*b[b_step*3+2];
845 float t3 = a[0]*b[3] + a[1]*b[b_step+3] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+3] + a[3]*b[b_step*3+3];
846 d[0] = (float)(t0*alpha + c[0]*beta);
847 d[1] = (float)(t1*alpha + c[1]*beta);
848 d[2] = (float)(t2*alpha + c[2]*beta);
849 d[3] = (float)(t3*alpha + c[3]*beta);
850 }
851 }
852 else if( len <= 16 && a != d )
853 {
854 int c_step0 = 1;
855 if( c == zerof )
856 {
857 c_step0 = 0;
858 c_step = 1;
859 }
860
861 for( i = 0; i < d_size.width; i++, d++, b++, c += c_step0 )
862 {
863 float t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2] + a[3]*b[b_step*3];
864 float t1 = a[a_step]*b[0] + a[a_step+1]*b[b_step] +
865 a[a_step+2]*b[b_step*2] + a[a_step+3]*b[b_step*3];
866 float t2 = a[a_step*2]*b[0] + a[a_step*2+1]*b[b_step] +
867 a[a_step*2+2]*b[b_step*2] + a[a_step*2+3]*b[b_step*3];
868 float t3 = a[a_step*3]*b[0] + a[a_step*3+1]*b[b_step] +
869 a[a_step*3+2]*b[b_step*2] + a[a_step*3+3]*b[b_step*3];
870 d[0] = (float)(t0*alpha + c[0]*beta);
871 d[d_step] = (float)(t1*alpha + c[c_step]*beta);
872 d[d_step*2] = (float)(t2*alpha + c[c_step*2]*beta);
873 d[d_step*3] = (float)(t3*alpha + c[c_step*3]*beta);
874 }
875 }
876 else
877 break;
878 return;
879 }
880 }
881
882 if( type == CV_64F )
883 {
884 double* d = (double*)D.data;
885 const double *a = (const double*)A.data,
886 *b = (const double*)B.data,
887 *c = (const double*)C.data;
888 size_t d_step = D.step/sizeof(d[0]),
889 a_step = A.step/sizeof(a[0]),
890 b_step = B.step/sizeof(b[0]),
891 c_step = C.data ? C.step/sizeof(c[0]) : 0;
892 if( !c )
893 c = zero;
894
895 switch( len )
896 {
897 case 2:
898 if( len == d_size.width && b != d )
899 {
900 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, d += d_step, a += a_step, c += c_step )
901 {
902 double t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step];
903 double t1 = a[0]*b[1] + a[1]*b[b_step+1];
904 d[0] = t0*alpha + c[0]*beta;
905 d[1] = t1*alpha + c[1]*beta;
906 }
907 }
908 else if( a != d )
909 {
910 int c_step0 = 1;
911 if( c == zero )
912 {
913 c_step0 = 0;
914 c_step = 1;
915 }
916
917 for( i = 0; i < d_size.width; i++, d++, b++, c += c_step0 )
918 {
919 double t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step];
920 double t1 = a[a_step]*b[0] + a[a_step+1]*b[b_step];
921 d[0] = t0*alpha + c[0]*beta;
922 d[d_step] = t1*alpha + c[c_step]*beta;
923 }
924 }
925 else
926 break;
927 return;
928 case 3:
929 if( len == d_size.width && b != d )
930 {
931 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, d += d_step, a += a_step, c += c_step )
932 {
933 double t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2];
934 double t1 = a[0]*b[1] + a[1]*b[b_step+1] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+1];
935 double t2 = a[0]*b[2] + a[1]*b[b_step+2] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+2];
936 d[0] = t0*alpha + c[0]*beta;
937 d[1] = t1*alpha + c[1]*beta;
938 d[2] = t2*alpha + c[2]*beta;
939 }
940 }
941 else if( a != d )
942 {
943 int c_step0 = 1;
944 if( c == zero )
945 {
946 c_step0 = 0;
947 c_step = 1;
948 }
949
950 for( i = 0; i < d_size.width; i++, d++, b++, c += c_step0 )
951 {
952 double t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2];
953 double t1 = a[a_step]*b[0] + a[a_step+1]*b[b_step] + a[a_step+2]*b[b_step*2];
954 double t2 = a[a_step*2]*b[0] + a[a_step*2+1]*b[b_step] + a[a_step*2+2]*b[b_step*2];
955
956 d[0] = t0*alpha + c[0]*beta;
957 d[d_step] = t1*alpha + c[c_step]*beta;
958 d[d_step*2] = t2*alpha + c[c_step*2]*beta;
959 }
960 }
961 else
962 break;
963 return;
964 case 4:
965 if( len == d_size.width && b != d )
966 {
967 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i++, d += d_step, a += a_step, c += c_step )
968 {
969 double t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2] + a[3]*b[b_step*3];
970 double t1 = a[0]*b[1] + a[1]*b[b_step+1] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+1] + a[3]*b[b_step*3+1];
971 double t2 = a[0]*b[2] + a[1]*b[b_step+2] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+2] + a[3]*b[b_step*3+2];
972 double t3 = a[0]*b[3] + a[1]*b[b_step+3] + a[2]*b[b_step*2+3] + a[3]*b[b_step*3+3];
973 d[0] = t0*alpha + c[0]*beta;
974 d[1] = t1*alpha + c[1]*beta;
975 d[2] = t2*alpha + c[2]*beta;
976 d[3] = t3*alpha + c[3]*beta;
977 }
978 }
979 else if( d_size.width <= 16 && a != d )
980 {
981 int c_step0 = 1;
982 if( c == zero )
983 {
984 c_step0 = 0;
985 c_step = 1;
986 }
987
988 for( i = 0; i < d_size.width; i++, d++, b++, c += c_step0 )
989 {
990 double t0 = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[b_step] + a[2]*b[b_step*2] + a[3]*b[b_step*3];
991 double t1 = a[a_step]*b[0] + a[a_step+1]*b[b_step] +
992 a[a_step+2]*b[b_step*2] + a[a_step+3]*b[b_step*3];
993 double t2 = a[a_step*2]*b[0] + a[a_step*2+1]*b[b_step] +
994 a[a_step*2+2]*b[b_step*2] + a[a_step*2+3]*b[b_step*3];
995 double t3 = a[a_step*3]*b[0] + a[a_step*3+1]*b[b_step] +
996 a[a_step*3+2]*b[b_step*2] + a[a_step*3+3]*b[b_step*3];
997 d[0] = t0*alpha + c[0]*beta;
998 d[d_step] = t1*alpha + c[c_step]*beta;
999 d[d_step*2] = t2*alpha + c[c_step*2]*beta;
1000 d[d_step*3] = t3*alpha + c[c_step*3]*beta;
1001 }
1002 }
1003 else
1004 break;
1005 return;
1006 }
1007 }
1008 }
1009
1010 {
1011 size_t b_step = B.step;
1012 GEMMSingleMulFunc singleMulFunc;
1013 GEMMBlockMulFunc blockMulFunc;
1014 GEMMStoreFunc storeFunc;
1015 Mat *matD = &D, tmat;
1016 size_t tmat_size = 0;
1017 const uchar* Cdata = C.data;
1018 size_t Cstep = C.data ? (size_t)C.step : 0;
1019 AutoBuffer<uchar> buf;
1020
1021 if( type == CV_32FC1 )
1022 {
1023 singleMulFunc = (GEMMSingleMulFunc)GEMMSingleMul_32f;
1024 blockMulFunc = (GEMMBlockMulFunc)GEMMBlockMul_32f;
1025 storeFunc = (GEMMStoreFunc)GEMMStore_32f;
1026 }
1027 else if( type == CV_64FC1 )
1028 {
1029 singleMulFunc = (GEMMSingleMulFunc)GEMMSingleMul_64f;
1030 blockMulFunc = (GEMMBlockMulFunc)GEMMBlockMul_64f;
1031 storeFunc = (GEMMStoreFunc)GEMMStore_64f;
1032 }
1033 else if( type == CV_32FC2 )
1034 {
1035 singleMulFunc = (GEMMSingleMulFunc)GEMMSingleMul_32fc;
1036 blockMulFunc = (GEMMBlockMulFunc)GEMMBlockMul_32fc;
1037 storeFunc = (GEMMStoreFunc)GEMMStore_32fc;
1038 }
1039 else
1040 {
1041 CV_Assert( type == CV_64FC2 );
1042 singleMulFunc = (GEMMSingleMulFunc)GEMMSingleMul_64fc;
1043 blockMulFunc = (GEMMBlockMulFunc)GEMMBlockMul_64fc;
1044 storeFunc = (GEMMStoreFunc)GEMMStore_64fc;
1045 }
1046
1047 if( D.data == A.data || D.data == B.data )
1048 {
1049 tmat_size = (size_t)d_size.width*d_size.height*CV_ELEM_SIZE(type);
1050 // Allocate tmat later, once the size of buf is known
1051 matD = &tmat;
1052 }
1053
1054 if( (d_size.width == 1 || len == 1) && !(flags & GEMM_2_T) && B.isContinuous() )
1055 {
1056 b_step = d_size.width == 1 ? 0 : CV_ELEM_SIZE(type);
1057 flags |= GEMM_2_T;
1058 }
1059
1060 /*if( (d_size.width | d_size.height | len) >= 16 && icvBLAS_GEMM_32f_p != 0 )
1061 {
1062 blas_func = type == CV_32FC1 ? (icvBLAS_GEMM_32f_t)icvBLAS_GEMM_32f_p :
1063 type == CV_64FC1 ? (icvBLAS_GEMM_32f_t)icvBLAS_GEMM_64f_p :
1064 type == CV_32FC2 ? (icvBLAS_GEMM_32f_t)icvBLAS_GEMM_32fc_p :
1065 type == CV_64FC2 ? (icvBLAS_GEMM_32f_t)icvBLAS_GEMM_64fc_p : 0;
1066 }
1067
1068 if( blas_func )
1069 {
1070 const char* transa = flags & GEMM_1_T ? "t" : "n";
1071 const char* transb = flags & GEMM_2_T ? "t" : "n";
1072 int lda, ldb, ldd;
1073
1074 if( C->data.ptr )
1075 {
1076 if( C->data.ptr != D->data.ptr )
1077 {
1078 if( !(flags & GEMM_3_T) )
1079 cvCopy( C, D );
1080 else
1081 cvTranspose( C, D );
1082 }
1083 }
1084
1085 if( CV_MAT_DEPTH(type) == CV_32F )
1086 {
1087 Complex32f _alpha, _beta;
1088
1089 lda = A->step/sizeof(float);
1090 ldb = b_step/sizeof(float);
1091 ldd = D->step/sizeof(float);
1092 _alpha.re = (float)alpha;
1093 _alpha.im = 0;
1094 _beta.re = C->data.ptr ? (float)beta : 0;
1095 _beta.im = 0;
1096 if( CV_MAT_CN(type) == 2 )
1097 lda /= 2, ldb /= 2, ldd /= 2;
1098
1099 blas_func( transb, transa, &d_size.width, &d_size.height, &len,
1100 &_alpha, B->data.ptr, &ldb, A->data.ptr, &lda,
1101 &_beta, D->data.ptr, &ldd );
1102 }
1103 else
1104 {
1105 CvComplex64f _alpha, _beta;
1106
1107 lda = A->step/sizeof(double);
1108 ldb = b_step/sizeof(double);
1109 ldd = D->step/sizeof(double);
1110 _alpha.re = alpha;
1111 _alpha.im = 0;
1112 _beta.re = C->data.ptr ? beta : 0;
1113 _beta.im = 0;
1114 if( CV_MAT_CN(type) == 2 )
1115 lda /= 2, ldb /= 2, ldd /= 2;
1116
1117 blas_func( transb, transa, &d_size.width, &d_size.height, &len,
1118 &_alpha, B->data.ptr, &ldb, A->data.ptr, &lda,
1119 &_beta, D->data.ptr, &ldd );
1120 }
1121 }
1122 else*/ if( ((d_size.height <= block_lin_size/2 || d_size.width <= block_lin_size/2) &&
1123 len <= 10000) || len <= 10 ||
1124 (d_size.width <= block_lin_size &&
1125 d_size.height <= block_lin_size && len <= block_lin_size) )
1126 {
1127 if( tmat_size > 0 ) {
1128 buf.allocate(tmat_size);
1129 tmat = Mat(d_size.height, d_size.width, type, (uchar*)buf );
1130 }
1131 singleMulFunc( A.data, A.step, B.data, b_step, Cdata, Cstep,
1132 matD->data, matD->step, a_size, d_size, alpha, beta, flags );
1133 }
1134 else
1135 {
1136 int is_a_t = flags & GEMM_1_T;
1137 int is_b_t = flags & GEMM_2_T;
1138 int elem_size = CV_ELEM_SIZE(type);
1139 int dk0_1, dk0_2;
1140 size_t a_buf_size = 0, b_buf_size, d_buf_size;
1141 uchar* a_buf = 0;
1142 uchar* b_buf = 0;
1143 uchar* d_buf = 0;
1144 int j, k, di = 0, dj = 0, dk = 0;
1145 int dm0, dn0, dk0;
1146 size_t a_step0, a_step1, b_step0, b_step1, c_step0, c_step1;
1147 int work_elem_size = elem_size << (CV_MAT_DEPTH(type) == CV_32F ? 1 : 0);
1148
1149 if( !is_a_t )
1150 a_step0 = A.step, a_step1 = elem_size;
1151 else
1152 a_step0 = elem_size, a_step1 = A.step;
1153
1154 if( !is_b_t )
1155 b_step0 = b_step, b_step1 = elem_size;
1156 else
1157 b_step0 = elem_size, b_step1 = b_step;
1158
1159 if( !C.data )
1160 {
1161 c_step0 = c_step1 = 0;
1162 flags &= ~GEMM_3_T;
1163 }
1164 else if( !(flags & GEMM_3_T) )
1165 c_step0 = C.step, c_step1 = elem_size;
1166 else
1167 c_step0 = elem_size, c_step1 = C.step;
1168
1169 dm0 = std::min( block_lin_size, d_size.height );
1170 dn0 = std::min( block_lin_size, d_size.width );
1171 dk0_1 = block_size / dm0;
1172 dk0_2 = block_size / dn0;
1173 dk0 = std::min( dk0_1, dk0_2 );
1174 dk0 = std::min( dk0, len );
1175 if( dk0*dm0 > block_size )
1176 dm0 = block_size / dk0;
1177 if( dk0*dn0 > block_size )
1178 dn0 = block_size / dk0;
1179
1180 dk0_1 = (dn0+dn0/8+2) & -2;
1181 b_buf_size = (size_t)(dk0+dk0/8+1)*dk0_1*elem_size;
1182 d_buf_size = (size_t)(dk0+dk0/8+1)*dk0_1*work_elem_size;
1183
1184 if( is_a_t )
1185 {
1186 a_buf_size = (dm0+dm0/8+1)*((dk0+dk0/8+2)&-2)*elem_size;
1187 flags &= ~GEMM_1_T;
1188 }
1189
1190 buf.allocate(d_buf_size + b_buf_size + a_buf_size + tmat_size);
1191 d_buf = (uchar*)buf;
1192 b_buf = d_buf + d_buf_size;
1193
1194 if( is_a_t )
1195 a_buf = b_buf + b_buf_size;
1196 if( tmat_size > 0 )
1197 tmat = Mat(d_size.height, d_size.width, type, b_buf + b_buf_size + a_buf_size );
1198
1199 for( i = 0; i < d_size.height; i += di )
1200 {
1201 di = dm0;
1202 if( i + di >= d_size.height || 8*(i + di) + di > 8*d_size.height )
1203 di = d_size.height - i;
1204
1205 for( j = 0; j < d_size.width; j += dj )
1206 {
1207 uchar* _d = matD->data + i*matD->step + j*elem_size;
1208 const uchar* _c = Cdata + i*c_step0 + j*c_step1;
1209 size_t _d_step = matD->step;
1210 dj = dn0;
1211
1212 if( j + dj >= d_size.width || 8*(j + dj) + dj > 8*d_size.width )
1213 dj = d_size.width - j;
1214
1215 flags &= 15;
1216 if( dk0 < len )
1217 {
1218 _d = d_buf;
1219 _d_step = dj*work_elem_size;
1220 }
1221
1222 for( k = 0; k < len; k += dk )
1223 {
1224 const uchar* _a = A.data + i*a_step0 + k*a_step1;
1225 size_t _a_step = A.step;
1226 const uchar* _b = B.data + k*b_step0 + j*b_step1;
1227 size_t _b_step = b_step;
1228 Size a_bl_size;
1229
1230 dk = dk0;
1231 if( k + dk >= len || 8*(k + dk) + dk > 8*len )
1232 dk = len - k;
1233
1234 if( !is_a_t )
1235 a_bl_size.width = dk, a_bl_size.height = di;
1236 else
1237 a_bl_size.width = di, a_bl_size.height = dk;
1238
1239 if( a_buf && is_a_t )
1240 {
1241 _a_step = dk*elem_size;
1242 GEMM_TransposeBlock( _a, A.step, a_buf, _a_step, a_bl_size, elem_size );
1243 std::swap( a_bl_size.width, a_bl_size.height );
1244 _a = a_buf;
1245 }
1246
1247 if( dj < d_size.width )
1248 {
1249 Size b_size;
1250 if( !is_b_t )
1251 b_size.width = dj, b_size.height = dk;
1252 else
1253 b_size.width = dk, b_size.height = dj;
1254
1255 _b_step = b_size.width*elem_size;
1256 GEMM_CopyBlock( _b, b_step, b_buf, _b_step, b_size, elem_size );
1257 _b = b_buf;
1258 }
1259
1260 if( dk0 < len )
1261 blockMulFunc( _a, _a_step, _b, _b_step, _d, _d_step,
1262 a_bl_size, Size(dj,di), flags );
1263 else
1264 singleMulFunc( _a, _a_step, _b, _b_step, _c, Cstep,
1265 _d, _d_step, a_bl_size, Size(dj,di), alpha, beta, flags );
1266 flags |= 16;
1267 }
1268
1269 if( dk0 < len )
1270 storeFunc( _c, Cstep, _d, _d_step,
1271 matD->data + i*matD->step + j*elem_size,
1272 matD->step, Size(dj,di), alpha, beta, flags );
1273 }
1274 }
1275 }
1276
1277 if( matD != &D )
1278 matD->copyTo(D);
1279 }
1280}
1281
1282/****************************************************************************************\
1283* Transform *
1284\****************************************************************************************/
1285
1286namespace cv
1287{
1288
1289template<typename T, typename WT> static void
1290transform_( const T* src, T* dst, const WT* m, int len, int scn, int dcn )
1291{
1292 int x;
1293
1294 if( scn == 2 && dcn == 2 )
1295 {
1296 for( x = 0; x < len*2; x += 2 )
1297 {
1298 WT v0 = src[x], v1 = src[x+1];
1299 T t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[0]*v0 + m[1]*v1 + m[2]);
1300 T t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[3]*v0 + m[4]*v1 + m[5]);
1301 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1;
1302 }
1303 }
1304 else if( scn == 3 && dcn == 3 )
1305 {
1306 for( x = 0; x < len*3; x += 3 )
1307 {
1308 WT v0 = src[x], v1 = src[x+1], v2 = src[x+2];
1309 T t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[0]*v0 + m[1]*v1 + m[2]*v2 + m[3]);
1310 T t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[4]*v0 + m[5]*v1 + m[6]*v2 + m[7]);
1311 T t2 = saturate_cast<T>(m[8]*v0 + m[9]*v1 + m[10]*v2 + m[11]);
1312 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1; dst[x+2] = t2;
1313 }
1314 }
1315 else if( scn == 3 && dcn == 1 )
1316 {
1317 for( x = 0; x < len; x++, src += 3 )
1318 dst[x] = saturate_cast<T>(m[0]*src[0] + m[1]*src[1] + m[2]*src[2] + m[3]);
1319 }
1320 else if( scn == 4 && dcn == 4 )
1321 {
1322 for( x = 0; x < len*4; x += 4 )
1323 {
1324 WT v0 = src[x], v1 = src[x+1], v2 = src[x+2], v3 = src[x+3];
1325 T t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[0]*v0 + m[1]*v1 + m[2]*v2 + m[3]*v3 + m[4]);
1326 T t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[5]*v0 + m[6]*v1 + m[7]*v2 + m[8]*v3 + m[9]);
1327 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1;
1328 t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[10]*v0 + m[11]*v1 + m[12]*v2 + m[13]*v3 + m[14]);
1329 t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[15]*v0 + m[16]*v1 + m[17]*v2 + m[18]*v3 + m[19]);
1330 dst[x+2] = t0; dst[x+3] = t1;
1331 }
1332 }
1333 else
1334 {
1335 for( x = 0; x < len; x++, src += scn, dst += dcn )
1336 {
1337 const WT* _m = m;
1338 int j, k;
1339 for( j = 0; j < dcn; j++, _m += scn + 1 )
1340 {
1341 WT s = _m[scn];
1342 for( k = 0; k < scn; k++ )
1343 s += _m[k]*src[k];
1344 dst[j] = saturate_cast<T>(s);
1345 }
1346 }
1347 }
1348}
1349
1350#if CV_SSE2
1351
1352static inline void
1353load3x3Matrix( const float* m, __m128& m0, __m128& m1, __m128& m2, __m128& m3 )
1354{
1355 m0 = _mm_setr_ps(m[0], m[4], m[8], 0);
1356 m1 = _mm_setr_ps(m[1], m[5], m[9], 0);
1357 m2 = _mm_setr_ps(m[2], m[6], m[10], 0);
1358 m3 = _mm_setr_ps(m[3], m[7], m[11], 0);
1359}
1360
1361static inline void
1362load4x4Matrix( const float* m, __m128& m0, __m128& m1, __m128& m2, __m128& m3, __m128& m4 )
1363{
1364 m0 = _mm_setr_ps(m[0], m[5], m[10], m[15]);
1365 m1 = _mm_setr_ps(m[1], m[6], m[11], m[16]);
1366 m2 = _mm_setr_ps(m[2], m[7], m[12], m[17]);
1367 m3 = _mm_setr_ps(m[3], m[8], m[13], m[18]);
1368 m4 = _mm_setr_ps(m[4], m[9], m[14], m[19]);
1369}
1370
1371#endif
1372
1373static void
1374transform_8u( const uchar* src, uchar* dst, const float* m, int len, int scn, int dcn )
1375{
1376#if CV_SSE2
1377 const int BITS = 10, SCALE = 1 << BITS;
1378 const float MAX_M = (float)(1 << (15 - BITS));
1379
1380 if( USE_SSE2 && scn == 3 && dcn == 3 &&
1381 std::abs(m[0]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[1]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[2]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[3]) < MAX_M*256 &&
1382 std::abs(m[4]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[5]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[6]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[7]) < MAX_M*256 &&
1383 std::abs(m[8]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[9]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[10]) < MAX_M && std::abs(m[11]) < MAX_M*256 )
1384 {
1385 // faster fixed-point transformation
1386 short m00 = saturate_cast<short>(m[0]*SCALE), m01 = saturate_cast<short>(m[1]*SCALE),
1387 m02 = saturate_cast<short>(m[2]*SCALE), m10 = saturate_cast<short>(m[4]*SCALE),
1388 m11 = saturate_cast<short>(m[5]*SCALE), m12 = saturate_cast<short>(m[6]*SCALE),
1389 m20 = saturate_cast<short>(m[8]*SCALE), m21 = saturate_cast<short>(m[9]*SCALE),
1390 m22 = saturate_cast<short>(m[10]*SCALE);
1391 int m03 = saturate_cast<int>((m[3]+0.5f)*SCALE), m13 = saturate_cast<int>((m[7]+0.5f)*SCALE ),
1392 m23 = saturate_cast<int>((m[11]+0.5f)*SCALE);
1393
1394 __m128i m0 = _mm_setr_epi16(0, m00, m01, m02, m00, m01, m02, 0);
1395 __m128i m1 = _mm_setr_epi16(0, m10, m11, m12, m10, m11, m12, 0);
1396 __m128i m2 = _mm_setr_epi16(0, m20, m21, m22, m20, m21, m22, 0);
1397 __m128i m3 = _mm_setr_epi32(m03, m13, m23, 0);
1398 int x = 0;
1399
1400 for( ; x <= (len - 8)*3; x += 8*3 )
1401 {
1402 __m128i z = _mm_setzero_si128(), t0, t1, t2, r0, r1;
1403 __m128i v0 = _mm_loadl_epi64((const __m128i*)(src + x));
1404 __m128i v1 = _mm_loadl_epi64((const __m128i*)(src + x + 8));
1405 __m128i v2 = _mm_loadl_epi64((const __m128i*)(src + x + 16)), v3;
1406 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v0, z); // b0 g0 r0 b1 g1 r1 b2 g2
1407 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v1, z); // r2 b3 g3 r3 b4 g4 r4 b5
1408 v2 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v2, z); // g5 r5 b6 g6 r6 b7 g7 r7
1409
1410 v3 = _mm_srli_si128(v2, 2); // ? b6 g6 r6 b7 g7 r7 0
1411 v2 = _mm_or_si128(_mm_slli_si128(v2, 10), _mm_srli_si128(v1, 6)); // ? b4 g4 r4 b5 g5 r5 ?
1412 v1 = _mm_or_si128(_mm_slli_si128(v1, 6), _mm_srli_si128(v0, 10)); // ? b2 g2 r2 b3 g3 r3 ?
1413 v0 = _mm_slli_si128(v0, 2); // 0 b0 g0 r0 b1 g1 r1 ?
1414
1415 // process pixels 0 & 1
1416 t0 = _mm_madd_epi16(v0, m0); // a0 b0 a1 b1
1417 t1 = _mm_madd_epi16(v0, m1); // c0 d0 c1 d1
1418 t2 = _mm_madd_epi16(v0, m2); // e0 f0 e1 f1
1419 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t0, t1); // a0 c0 b0 d0
1420 t0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t0, t1); // a1 b1 c1 d1
1421 t1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t2, z); // e0 0 f0 0
1422 t2 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t2, z); // e1 0 f1 0
1423 r0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(v0, t1), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(v0,t1)), m3); // B0 G0 R0 0
1424 r1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(t0, t2), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(t0,t2)), m3); // B1 G1 R1 0
1425 r0 = _mm_srai_epi32(r0, BITS);
1426 r1 = _mm_srai_epi32(r1, BITS);
1427 v0 = _mm_packus_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(_mm_slli_si128(r0, 4), r1), z); // 0 B0 G0 R0 B1 G1 R1 0
1428
1429 // process pixels 2 & 3
1430 t0 = _mm_madd_epi16(v1, m0); // a0 b0 a1 b1
1431 t1 = _mm_madd_epi16(v1, m1); // c0 d0 c1 d1
1432 t2 = _mm_madd_epi16(v1, m2); // e0 f0 e1 f1
1433 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t0, t1); // a0 c0 b0 d0
1434 t0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t0, t1); // a1 b1 c1 d1
1435 t1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t2, z); // e0 0 f0 0
1436 t2 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t2, z); // e1 0 f1 0
1437 r0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(v1, t1), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(v1,t1)), m3); // B2 G2 R2 0
1438 r1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(t0, t2), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(t0,t2)), m3); // B3 G3 R3 0
1439 r0 = _mm_srai_epi32(r0, BITS);
1440 r1 = _mm_srai_epi32(r1, BITS);
1441 v1 = _mm_packus_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(_mm_slli_si128(r0, 4), r1), z); // 0 B2 G2 R2 B3 G3 R3 0
1442
1443 // process pixels 4 & 5
1444 t0 = _mm_madd_epi16(v2, m0); // a0 b0 a1 b1
1445 t1 = _mm_madd_epi16(v2, m1); // c0 d0 c1 d1
1446 t2 = _mm_madd_epi16(v2, m2); // e0 f0 e1 f1
1447 v2 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t0, t1); // a0 c0 b0 d0
1448 t0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t0, t1); // a1 b1 c1 d1
1449 t1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t2, z); // e0 0 f0 0
1450 t2 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t2, z); // e1 0 f1 0
1451 r0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(v2, t1), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(v2,t1)), m3); // B4 G4 R4 0
1452 r1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(t0, t2), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(t0,t2)), m3); // B5 G5 R5 0
1453 r0 = _mm_srai_epi32(r0, BITS);
1454 r1 = _mm_srai_epi32(r1, BITS);
1455 v2 = _mm_packus_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(_mm_slli_si128(r0, 4), r1), z); // 0 B4 G4 R4 B5 G5 R5 0
1456
1457 // process pixels 6 & 7
1458 t0 = _mm_madd_epi16(v3, m0); // a0 b0 a1 b1
1459 t1 = _mm_madd_epi16(v3, m1); // c0 d0 c1 d1
1460 t2 = _mm_madd_epi16(v3, m2); // e0 f0 e1 f1
1461 v3 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t0, t1); // a0 c0 b0 d0
1462 t0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t0, t1); // a1 b1 c1 d1
1463 t1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(t2, z); // e0 0 f0 0
1464 t2 = _mm_unpackhi_epi32(t2, z); // e1 0 f1 0
1465 r0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(v3, t1), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(v3,t1)), m3); // B6 G6 R6 0
1466 r1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(_mm_unpacklo_epi64(t0, t2), _mm_unpackhi_epi64(t0,t2)), m3); // B7 G7 R7 0
1467 r0 = _mm_srai_epi32(r0, BITS);
1468 r1 = _mm_srai_epi32(r1, BITS);
1469 v3 = _mm_packus_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(_mm_slli_si128(r0, 4), r1), z); // 0 B6 G6 R6 B7 G7 R7 0
1470
1471 v0 = _mm_or_si128(_mm_srli_si128(v0, 1), _mm_slli_si128(v1, 5));
1472 v1 = _mm_or_si128(_mm_srli_si128(v1, 3), _mm_slli_si128(v2, 3));
1473 v2 = _mm_or_si128(_mm_srli_si128(v2, 5), _mm_slli_si128(v3, 1));
1474 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)(dst + x), v0);
1475 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)(dst + x + 8), v1);
1476 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)(dst + x + 16), v2);
1477 }
1478
1479 for( ; x < len*3; x += 3 )
1480 {
1481 int v0 = src[x], v1 = src[x+1], v2 = src[x+2];
1482 uchar t0 = saturate_cast<uchar>((m00*v0 + m01*v1 + m02*v2 + m03)>>BITS);
1483 uchar t1 = saturate_cast<uchar>((m10*v0 + m11*v1 + m12*v2 + m13)>>BITS);
1484 uchar t2 = saturate_cast<uchar>((m20*v0 + m21*v1 + m22*v2 + m23)>>BITS);
1485 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1; dst[x+2] = t2;
1486 }
1487 return;
1488 }
1489#endif
1490
1491 transform_(src, dst, m, len, scn, dcn);
1492}
1493
1494static void
1495transform_16u( const ushort* src, ushort* dst, const float* m, int len, int scn, int dcn )
1496{
1497#if CV_SSE2
1498 if( USE_SSE2 && scn == 3 && dcn == 3 )
1499 {
1500 __m128 m0, m1, m2, m3;
1501 __m128i delta = _mm_setr_epi16(0,-32768,-32768,-32768,-32768,-32768,-32768,0);
1502 load3x3Matrix(m, m0, m1, m2, m3);
1503 m3 = _mm_sub_ps(m3, _mm_setr_ps(32768.f, 32768.f, 32768.f, 0.f));
1504
1505 int x = 0;
1506 for( ; x <= (len - 4)*3; x += 4*3 )
1507 {
1508 __m128i z = _mm_setzero_si128();
1509 __m128i v0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(src + x)), v1;
1510 __m128i v2 = _mm_loadl_epi64((const __m128i*)(src + x + 8)), v3;
1511 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi16(_mm_srli_si128(v0, 6), z); // b1 g1 r1
1512 v3 = _mm_unpacklo_epi16(_mm_srli_si128(v2, 2), z); // b3 g3 r3
1513 v2 = _mm_or_si128(_mm_srli_si128(v0, 12), _mm_slli_si128(v2, 4));
1514 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi16(v0, z); // b0 g0 r0
1515 v2 = _mm_unpacklo_epi16(v2, z); // b2 g2 r2
1516 __m128 x0 = _mm_cvtepi32_ps(v0), x1 = _mm_cvtepi32_ps(v1);
1517 __m128 x2 = _mm_cvtepi32_ps(v2), x3 = _mm_cvtepi32_ps(v3);
1518 __m128 y0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(
1519 _mm_mul_ps(m0, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(0,0,0,0))),
1520 _mm_mul_ps(m1, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(1,1,1,1)))),
1521 _mm_mul_ps(m2, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(2,2,2,2)))), m3);
1522 __m128 y1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(
1523 _mm_mul_ps(m0, _mm_shuffle_ps(x1,x1,_MM_SHUFFLE(0,0,0,0))),
1524 _mm_mul_ps(m1, _mm_shuffle_ps(x1,x1,_MM_SHUFFLE(1,1,1,1)))),
1525 _mm_mul_ps(m2, _mm_shuffle_ps(x1,x1,_MM_SHUFFLE(2,2,2,2)))), m3);
1526 __m128 y2 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(
1527 _mm_mul_ps(m0, _mm_shuffle_ps(x2,x2,_MM_SHUFFLE(0,0,0,0))),
1528 _mm_mul_ps(m1, _mm_shuffle_ps(x2,x2,_MM_SHUFFLE(1,1,1,1)))),
1529 _mm_mul_ps(m2, _mm_shuffle_ps(x2,x2,_MM_SHUFFLE(2,2,2,2)))), m3);
1530 __m128 y3 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(
1531 _mm_mul_ps(m0, _mm_shuffle_ps(x3,x3,_MM_SHUFFLE(0,0,0,0))),
1532 _mm_mul_ps(m1, _mm_shuffle_ps(x3,x3,_MM_SHUFFLE(1,1,1,1)))),
1533 _mm_mul_ps(m2, _mm_shuffle_ps(x3,x3,_MM_SHUFFLE(2,2,2,2)))), m3);
1534 v0 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(y0); v1 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(y1);
1535 v2 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(y2); v3 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(y3);
1536
1537 v0 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(_mm_slli_si128(v0,4), v1), delta); // 0 b0 g0 r0 b1 g1 r1 0
1538 v2 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(_mm_slli_si128(v2,4), v3), delta); // 0 b2 g2 r2 b3 g3 r3 0
1539 v1 = _mm_or_si128(_mm_srli_si128(v0,2), _mm_slli_si128(v2,10)); // b0 g0 r0 b1 g1 r1 b2 g2
1540 v2 = _mm_srli_si128(v2, 6); // r2 b3 g3 r3 0 0 0 0
1541 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(dst + x), v1);
1542 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)(dst + x + 8), v2);
1543 }
1544
1545 for( ; x < len*3; x += 3 )
1546 {
1547 float v0 = src[x], v1 = src[x+1], v2 = src[x+2];
1548 ushort t0 = saturate_cast<ushort>(m[0]*v0 + m[1]*v1 + m[2]*v2 + m[3]);
1549 ushort t1 = saturate_cast<ushort>(m[4]*v0 + m[5]*v1 + m[6]*v2 + m[7]);
1550 ushort t2 = saturate_cast<ushort>(m[8]*v0 + m[9]*v1 + m[10]*v2 + m[11]);
1551 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1; dst[x+2] = t2;
1552 }
1553 return;
1554 }
1555#endif
1556
1557 transform_(src, dst, m, len, scn, dcn);
1558}
1559
1560
1561static void
1562transform_32f( const float* src, float* dst, const float* m, int len, int scn, int dcn )
1563{
1564#if CV_SSE2
1565 if( USE_SSE2 )
1566 {
1567 int x = 0;
1568 if( scn == 3 && dcn == 3 )
1569 {
1570 __m128 m0, m1, m2, m3;
1571 load3x3Matrix(m, m0, m1, m2, m3);
1572
1573 for( ; x < (len - 1)*3; x += 3 )
1574 {
1575 __m128 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(src + x);
1576 __m128 y0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(
1577 _mm_mul_ps(m0, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(0,0,0,0))),
1578 _mm_mul_ps(m1, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(1,1,1,1)))),
1579 _mm_mul_ps(m2, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(2,2,2,2)))), m3);
1580 _mm_storel_pi((__m64*)(dst + x), y0);
1581 _mm_store_ss(dst + x + 2, _mm_movehl_ps(y0,y0));
1582 }
1583
1584 for( ; x < len*3; x += 3 )
1585 {
1586 float v0 = src[x], v1 = src[x+1], v2 = src[x+2];
1587 float t0 = saturate_cast<float>(m[0]*v0 + m[1]*v1 + m[2]*v2 + m[3]);
1588 float t1 = saturate_cast<float>(m[4]*v0 + m[5]*v1 + m[6]*v2 + m[7]);
1589 float t2 = saturate_cast<float>(m[8]*v0 + m[9]*v1 + m[10]*v2 + m[11]);
1590 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1; dst[x+2] = t2;
1591 }
1592 return;
1593 }
1594
1595 if( scn == 4 && dcn == 4 )
1596 {
1597 __m128 m0, m1, m2, m3, m4;
1598 load4x4Matrix(m, m0, m1, m2, m3, m4);
1599
1600 for( ; x < len*4; x += 4 )
1601 {
1602 __m128 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(src + x);
1603 __m128 y0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(_mm_add_ps(
1604 _mm_mul_ps(m0, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(0,0,0,0))),
1605 _mm_mul_ps(m1, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(1,1,1,1)))),
1606 _mm_mul_ps(m2, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(2,2,2,2)))),
1607 _mm_mul_ps(m3, _mm_shuffle_ps(x0,x0,_MM_SHUFFLE(3,3,3,3)))), m4);
1608 _mm_storeu_ps(dst + x, y0);
1609 }
1610 return;
1611 }
1612 }
1613#endif
1614
1615 transform_(src, dst, m, len, scn, dcn);
1616}
1617

1642
1643template<typename T, typename WT> static void
1644diagtransform_( const T* src, T* dst, const WT* m, int len, int cn, int )
1645{
1646 int x;
1647
1648 if( cn == 2 )
1649 {
1650 for( x = 0; x < len*2; x += 2 )
1651 {
1652 T t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[0]*src[x] + m[2]);
1653 T t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[4]*src[x+1] + m[5]);
1654 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1;
1655 }
1656 }
1657 else if( cn == 3 )
1658 {
1659 for( x = 0; x < len*3; x += 3 )
1660 {
1661 T t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[0]*src[x] + m[3]);
1662 T t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[5]*src[x+1] + m[7]);
1663 T t2 = saturate_cast<T>(m[10]*src[x+2] + m[11]);
1664 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1; dst[x+2] = t2;
1665 }
1666 }
1667 else if( cn == 4 )
1668 {
1669 for( x = 0; x < len*4; x += 4 )
1670 {
1671 T t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[0]*src[x] + m[4]);
1672 T t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[6]*src[x+1] + m[9]);
1673 dst[x] = t0; dst[x+1] = t1;
1674 t0 = saturate_cast<T>(m[12]*src[x+2] + m[14]);
1675 t1 = saturate_cast<T>(m[18]*src[x+3] + m[19]);
1676 dst[x+2] = t0; dst[x+3] = t1;
1677 }
1678 }
1679 else
1680 {
1681 for( x = 0; x < len; x++, src += cn, dst += cn )
1682 {
1683 const WT* _m = m;
1684 for( int j = 0; j < cn; j++, _m += cn + 1 )
1685 dst[j] = saturate_cast<T>(src[j]*_m[j] + _m[cn]);
1686 }
1687 }
1688}
1689

1691diagtransform_8u(const uchar* src, uchar* dst, const float* m, int len, int scn, int dcn)
1692{
1693 diagtransform_(src, dst, m, len, scn, dcn);
1694}

1732
1733typedef void (*TransformFunc)( const uchar* src, uchar* dst, const uchar* m, int, int, int );
1734
1735static TransformFunc getTransformFunc(int depth)
1736{
1737 static TransformFunc transformTab[] =
1738 {
1739 (TransformFunc)transform_8u, (TransformFunc)transform_8s, (TransformFunc)transform_16u,
1740 (TransformFunc)transform_16s, (TransformFunc)transform_32s, (TransformFunc)transform_32f,
1741 (TransformFunc)transform_64f, 0
1742 };
1743
1744 return transformTab[depth];
1745}
1746
1747static TransformFunc getDiagTransformFunc(int depth)
1748{
1749 static TransformFunc diagTransformTab[] =
1750 {
1751 (TransformFunc)diagtransform_8u, (TransformFunc)diagtransform_8s, (TransformFunc)diagtransform_16u,
1752 (TransformFunc)diagtransform_16s, (TransformFunc)diagtransform_32s, (TransformFunc)diagtransform_32f,
1753 (TransformFunc)diagtransform_64f, 0
1754 };
1755
1756 return diagTransformTab[depth];
1757}
1758
1759}
1760
1761void cv::transform( InputArray _src, OutputArray _dst, InputArray _mtx )
1762{
1763 Mat src = _src.getMat(), m = _mtx.getMat();
1764 int depth = src.depth(), scn = src.channels(), dcn = m.rows;
1765 CV_Assert( scn == m.cols || scn + 1 == m.cols );
1766 bool isDiag = false;
1767
1768 _dst.create( src.size(), CV_MAKETYPE(depth, dcn) );
1769 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
1770
1771 int mtype = depth == CV_32S || depth == CV_64F ? CV_64F : CV_32F;
1772 AutoBuffer<double> _mbuf;
1773 double* mbuf;
1774
1775 if( !m.isContinuous() || m.type() != mtype || m.cols != scn + 1 )
1776 {
1777 _mbuf.allocate(dcn*(scn+1));
1778 mbuf = (double*)_mbuf;
1779 Mat tmp(dcn, scn+1, mtype, mbuf);
1780 memset(tmp.data, 0, tmp.total()*tmp.elemSize());
1781 if( m.cols == scn+1 )
1782 m.convertTo(tmp, mtype);
1783 else
1784 {
1785 Mat tmppart = tmp.colRange(0, m.cols);
1786 m.convertTo(tmppart, mtype);
1787 }
1788 m = tmp;
1789 }
1790 else
1791 mbuf = (double*)m.data;
1792
1793 if( scn == dcn )
1794 {
1795 int i, j;
1796 double eps = mtype == CV_32F ? FLT_EPSILON : DBL_EPSILON;
1797
1798 if( scn == 1 )
1799 {
1800 double alpha, beta;
1801 if( mtype == CV_32F )
1802 alpha = m.at<float>(0), beta = m.at<float>(1);
1803 else
1804 alpha = m.at<double>(0), beta = m.at<double>(1);
1805 src.convertTo(dst, dst.type(), alpha, beta);
1806 return;
1807 }
1808
1809 for( i = 0, isDiag = true; isDiag && i < scn; i++ )
1810 {
1811 for( j = 0; isDiag && j < scn; j++ )
1812 {
1813 double v = mtype == CV_32F ? m.at<float>(i, j) : m.at<double>(i, j);
1814 if( i != j && fabs(v) > eps )
1815 isDiag = false;
1816 }
1817 }
1818 }
1819
1820 TransformFunc func = isDiag ? getDiagTransformFunc(depth): getTransformFunc(depth);
1821 CV_Assert( func != 0 );
1822
1823 const Mat* arrays[] = {&src, &dst, 0};
1824 uchar* ptrs[2];
1825 NAryMatIterator it(arrays, ptrs);
1826 size_t i, total = it.size;
1827
1828 for( i = 0; i < it.nplanes; i++, ++it )
1829 func( ptrs[0], ptrs[1], (uchar*)mbuf, (int)total, scn, dcn );
1830}
1831
1832/****************************************************************************************\
1833* Perspective Transform *
1834\****************************************************************************************/
1835
1836namespace cv
1837{
1838
1839template<typename T> static void
1840perspectiveTransform_( const T* src, T* dst, const double* m, int len, int scn, int dcn )
1841{
1842 const double eps = FLT_EPSILON;
1843 int i;
1844
1845 if( scn == 2 && dcn == 2 )
1846 {
1847 for( i = 0; i < len*2; i += 2 )
1848 {
1849 T x = src[i], y = src[i + 1];
1850 double w = x*m[6] + y*m[7] + m[8];
1851
1852 if( fabs(w) > eps )
1853 {
1854 w = 1./w;
1855 dst[i] = (T)((x*m[0] + y*m[1] + m[2])*w);
1856 dst[i+1] = (T)((x*m[3] + y*m[4] + m[5])*w);
1857 }
1858 else
1859 dst[i] = dst[i+1] = (T)0;
1860 }
1861 }
1862 else if( scn == 3 && dcn == 3 )
1863 {
1864 for( i = 0; i < len*3; i += 3 )
1865 {
1866 T x = src[i], y = src[i + 1], z = src[i + 2];
1867 double w = x*m[12] + y*m[13] + z*m[14] + m[15];
1868
1869 if( fabs(w) > eps )
1870 {
1871 w = 1./w;
1872 dst[i] = (T)((x*m[0] + y*m[1] + z*m[2] + m[3]) * w);
1873 dst[i+1] = (T)((x*m[4] + y*m[5] + z*m[6] + m[7]) * w);
1874 dst[i+2] = (T)((x*m[8] + y*m[9] + z*m[10] + m[11]) * w);
1875 }
1876 else
1877 dst[i] = dst[i+1] = dst[i+2] = (T)0;
1878 }
1879 }
1880 else if( scn == 3 && dcn == 2 )
1881 {
1882 for( i = 0; i < len; i++, src += 3, dst += 2 )
1883 {
1884 T x = src[0], y = src[1], z = src[2];
1885 double w = x*m[8] + y*m[9] + z*m[10] + m[11];
1886
1887 if( fabs(w) > eps )
1888 {
1889 w = 1./w;
1890 dst[0] = (T)((x*m[0] + y*m[1] + z*m[2] + m[3])*w);
1891 dst[1] = (T)((x*m[4] + y*m[5] + z*m[6] + m[7])*w);
1892 }
1893 else
1894 dst[0] = dst[1] = (T)0;
1895 }
1896 }
1897 else
1898 {
1899 for( i = 0; i < len; i++, src += scn, dst += dcn )
1900 {
1901 const double* _m = m + dcn*(scn + 1);
1902 double w = _m[scn];
1903 int j, k;
1904 for( k = 0; k < scn; k++ )
1905 w += _m[k]*src[k];
1906 if( fabs(w) > eps )
1907 {
1908 _m = m;
1909 for( j = 0; j < dcn; j++, _m += scn + 1 )
1910 {
1911 double s = _m[scn];
1912 for( k = 0; k < scn; k++ )
1913 s += _m[k]*src[k];
1914 dst[j] = (T)(s*w);
1915 }
1916 }
1917 else
1918 for( j = 0; j < dcn; j++ )
1919 dst[j] = 0;
1920 }
1921 }
1922}
1923
1924
1925static void
1926perspectiveTransform_32f(const float* src, float* dst, const double* m, int len, int scn, int dcn)
1927{
1928 perspectiveTransform_(src, dst, m, len, scn, dcn);
1929}
1930
1931static void
1932perspectiveTransform_64f(const double* src, double* dst, const double* m, int len, int scn, int dcn)
1933{
1934 perspectiveTransform_(src, dst, m, len, scn, dcn);
1935}
1936
1937}
1938
1939void cv::perspectiveTransform( InputArray _src, OutputArray _dst, InputArray _mtx )
1940{
1941 Mat src = _src.getMat(), m = _mtx.getMat();
1942 int depth = src.depth(), scn = src.channels(), dcn = m.rows-1;
1943 CV_Assert( scn + 1 == m.cols && (depth == CV_32F || depth == CV_64F));
1944
1945 _dst.create( src.size(), CV_MAKETYPE(depth, dcn) );
1946 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
1947
1948 const int mtype = CV_64F;
1949 AutoBuffer<double> _mbuf;
1950 double* mbuf = _mbuf;
1951
1952 if( !m.isContinuous() || m.type() != mtype )
1953 {
1954 _mbuf.allocate((dcn+1)*(scn+1));
1955 Mat tmp(dcn+1, scn+1, mtype, (double*)_mbuf);
1956 m.convertTo(tmp, mtype);
1957 m = tmp;
1958 }
1959 else
1960 mbuf = (double*)m.data;
1961
1962 TransformFunc func = depth == CV_32F ?
1963 (TransformFunc)perspectiveTransform_32f :
1964 (TransformFunc)perspectiveTransform_64f;
1965 CV_Assert( func != 0 );
1966
1967 const Mat* arrays[] = {&src, &dst, 0};
1968 uchar* ptrs[2];
1969 NAryMatIterator it(arrays, ptrs);
1970 size_t i, total = it.size;
1971
1972 for( i = 0; i < it.nplanes; i++, ++it )
1973 func( ptrs[0], ptrs[1], (uchar*)mbuf, (int)total, scn, dcn );
1974}
1975
1976/****************************************************************************************\
1977* ScaleAdd *
1978\****************************************************************************************/
1979
1980namespace cv
1981{
1982
1983static void scaleAdd_32f(const float* src1, const float* src2, float* dst,
1984 int len, float* _alpha)
1985{
1986 float alpha = *_alpha;
1987 int i = 0;
1988#if CV_SSE2
1989 if( USE_SSE2 )
1990 {
1991 __m128 a4 = _mm_set1_ps(alpha);
1992 if( (((size_t)src1|(size_t)src2|(size_t)dst) & 15) == 0 )
1993 for( ; i <= len - 8; i += 8 )
1994 {
1995 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1, t0, t1;
1996 x0 = _mm_load_ps(src1 + i); x1 = _mm_load_ps(src1 + i + 4);
1997 y0 = _mm_load_ps(src2 + i); y1 = _mm_load_ps(src2 + i + 4);
1998 t0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, a4), y0);
1999 t1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, a4), y1);
2000 _mm_store_ps(dst + i, t0);
2001 _mm_store_ps(dst + i + 4, t1);
2002 }
2003 else
2004 for( ; i <= len - 8; i += 8 )
2005 {
2006 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1, t0, t1;
2007 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(src1 + i); x1 = _mm_loadu_ps(src1 + i + 4);
2008 y0 = _mm_loadu_ps(src2 + i); y1 = _mm_loadu_ps(src2 + i + 4);
2009 t0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, a4), y0);
2010 t1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, a4), y1);
2011 _mm_storeu_ps(dst + i, t0);
2012 _mm_storeu_ps(dst + i + 4, t1);
2013 }
2014 }
2015 else
2016#endif
2017 //vz why do we need unroll here?
2018 for( ; i <= len - 4; i += 4 )
2019 {
2020 float t0, t1;
2021 t0 = src1[i]*alpha + src2[i];
2022 t1 = src1[i+1]*alpha + src2[i+1];
2023 dst[i] = t0; dst[i+1] = t1;
2024 t0 = src1[i+2]*alpha + src2[i+2];
2025 t1 = src1[i+3]*alpha + src2[i+3];
2026 dst[i+2] = t0; dst[i+3] = t1;
2027 }
2028 for(; i < len; i++ )
2029 dst[i] = src1[i]*alpha + src2[i];
2030}
2031
2032
2033static void scaleAdd_64f(const double* src1, const double* src2, double* dst,
2034 int len, double* _alpha)
2035{
2036 double alpha = *_alpha;
2037 int i = 0;
2038#if CV_SSE2
2039 if( USE_SSE2 && (((size_t)src1|(size_t)src2|(size_t)dst) & 15) == 0 )
2040 {
2041 __m128d a2 = _mm_set1_pd(alpha);
2042 for( ; i <= len - 4; i += 4 )
2043 {
2044 __m128d x0, x1, y0, y1, t0, t1;
2045 x0 = _mm_load_pd(src1 + i); x1 = _mm_load_pd(src1 + i + 2);
2046 y0 = _mm_load_pd(src2 + i); y1 = _mm_load_pd(src2 + i + 2);
2047 t0 = _mm_add_pd(_mm_mul_pd(x0, a2), y0);
2048 t1 = _mm_add_pd(_mm_mul_pd(x1, a2), y1);
2049 _mm_store_pd(dst + i, t0);
2050 _mm_store_pd(dst + i + 2, t1);
2051 }
2052 }
2053 else
2054#endif
2055 //vz why do we need unroll here?
2056 for( ; i <= len - 4; i += 4 )
2057 {
2058 double t0, t1;
2059 t0 = src1[i]*alpha + src2[i];
2060 t1 = src1[i+1]*alpha + src2[i+1];
2061 dst[i] = t0; dst[i+1] = t1;
2062 t0 = src1[i+2]*alpha + src2[i+2];
2063 t1 = src1[i+3]*alpha + src2[i+3];
2064 dst[i+2] = t0; dst[i+3] = t1;
2065 }
2066 for(; i < len; i++ )
2067 dst[i] = src1[i]*alpha + src2[i];
2068}
2069
2070typedef void (*ScaleAddFunc)(const uchar* src1, const uchar* src2, uchar* dst, int len, const void* alpha);
2071
2072}
2073
2074void cv::scaleAdd( InputArray _src1, double alpha, InputArray _src2, OutputArray _dst )
2075{
2076 Mat src1 = _src1.getMat(), src2 = _src2.getMat();
2077 int depth = src1.depth(), cn = src1.channels();
2078
2079 CV_Assert( src1.type() == src2.type() );
2080 if( depth < CV_32F )
2081 {
2082 addWeighted(_src1, alpha, _src2, 1, 0, _dst, depth);
2083 return;
2084 }
2085
2086 _dst.create(src1.dims, src1.size, src1.type());
2087 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
2088
2089 float falpha = (float)alpha;
2090 void* palpha = depth == CV_32F ? (void*)&falpha : (void*)&alpha;
2091
2092 ScaleAddFunc func = depth == CV_32F ? (ScaleAddFunc)scaleAdd_32f : (ScaleAddFunc)scaleAdd_64f;
2093
2094 if( src1.isContinuous() && src2.isContinuous() && dst.isContinuous() )
2095 {
2096 size_t len = src1.total()*cn;
2097 func(src1.data, src2.data, dst.data, (int)len, palpha);
2098 return;
2099 }
2100
2101 const Mat* arrays[] = {&src1, &src2, &dst, 0};
2102 uchar* ptrs[3];
2103 NAryMatIterator it(arrays, ptrs);
2104 size_t i, len = it.size*cn;
2105
2106 for( i = 0; i < it.nplanes; i++, ++it )
2107 func( ptrs[0], ptrs[1], ptrs[2], (int)len, palpha );
2108}
2109
2110/****************************************************************************************\
2111* Covariation Matrix *
2112\****************************************************************************************/
2113
2114void cv::calcCovarMatrix( const Mat* data, int nsamples, Mat& covar, Mat& _mean, int flags, int ctype )
2115{
2116 CV_Assert( data && nsamples > 0 );
2117 Size size = data[0].size();
2118 int sz = size.width * size.height, esz = (int)data[0].elemSize();
2119 int type = data[0].type();
2120 Mat mean;
2121 ctype = std::max(std::max(CV_MAT_DEPTH(ctype >= 0 ? ctype : type), _mean.depth()), CV_32F);
2122
2123 if( (flags & CV_COVAR_USE_AVG) != 0 )
2124 {
2125 CV_Assert( _mean.size() == size );
2126 if( _mean.isContinuous() && _mean.type() == ctype )
2127 mean = _mean.reshape(1, 1);
2128 else
2129 {
2130 _mean.convertTo(mean, ctype);
2131 mean = mean.reshape(1, 1);
2132 }
2133 }
2134
2135 Mat _data(nsamples, sz, type);
2136
2137 for( int i = 0; i < nsamples; i++ )
2138 {
2139 CV_Assert( data[i].size() == size && data[i].type() == type );
2140 if( data[i].isContinuous() )
2141 memcpy( _data.ptr(i), data[i].data, sz*esz );
2142 else
2143 {
2144 Mat dataRow(size.height, size.width, type, _data.ptr(i));
2145 data[i].copyTo(dataRow);
2146 }
2147 }
2148
2149 calcCovarMatrix( _data, covar, mean, (flags & ~(CV_COVAR_ROWS|CV_COVAR_COLS)) | CV_COVAR_ROWS, ctype );
2150 if( (flags & CV_COVAR_USE_AVG) == 0 )
2151 _mean = mean.reshape(1, size.height);
2152}
2153
2154void cv::calcCovarMatrix( InputArray _src, OutputArray _covar, InputOutputArray _mean, int flags, int ctype )
2155{
2156 if(_src.kind() == _InputArray::STD_VECTOR_MAT)
2157 {
2158 std::vector<cv::Mat> src;
2159 _src.getMatVector(src);
2160
2161 CV_Assert( src.size() > 0 );
2162
2163 Size size = src[0].size();
2164 int type = src[0].type();
2165
2166 ctype = std::max(std::max(CV_MAT_DEPTH(ctype >= 0 ? ctype : type), _mean.depth()), CV_32F);
2167
2168 Mat _data(static_cast<int>(src.size()), size.area(), type);
2169
2170 int i = 0;
2171 for(vector<cv::Mat>::iterator each = src.begin(); each != src.end(); each++, i++ )
2172 {
2173 CV_Assert( (*each).size() == size && (*each).type() == type );
2174 Mat dataRow(size.height, size.width, type, _data.ptr(i));
2175 (*each).copyTo(dataRow);
2176 }
2177
2178 Mat mean;
2179 if( (flags & CV_COVAR_USE_AVG) != 0 )
2180 {
2181 CV_Assert( _mean.size() == size );
2182
2183 if( mean.type() != ctype )
2184 {
2185 mean = _mean.getMat();
2186 _mean.create(mean.size(), ctype);
2187 Mat tmp = _mean.getMat();
2188 mean.convertTo(tmp, ctype);
2189 mean = tmp;
2190 }
2191
2192 mean = _mean.getMat().reshape(1, 1);
2193 }
2194
2195 calcCovarMatrix( _data, _covar, mean, (flags & ~(CV_COVAR_ROWS|CV_COVAR_COLS)) | CV_COVAR_ROWS, ctype );
2196
2197 if( (flags & CV_COVAR_USE_AVG) == 0 )
2198 {
2199 mean = mean.reshape(1, size.height);
2200 mean.copyTo(_mean);
2201 }
2202 return;
2203 }
2204
2205 Mat data = _src.getMat(), mean;
2206 CV_Assert( ((flags & CV_COVAR_ROWS) != 0) ^ ((flags & CV_COVAR_COLS) != 0) );
2207 bool takeRows = (flags & CV_COVAR_ROWS) != 0;
2208 int type = data.type();
2209 int nsamples = takeRows ? data.rows : data.cols;
2210 CV_Assert( nsamples > 0 );
2211 Size size = takeRows ? Size(data.cols, 1) : Size(1, data.rows);
2212
2213 if( (flags & CV_COVAR_USE_AVG) != 0 )
2214 {
2215 mean = _mean.getMat();
2216 ctype = std::max(std::max(CV_MAT_DEPTH(ctype >= 0 ? ctype : type), mean.depth()), CV_32F);
2217 CV_Assert( mean.size() == size );
2218 if( mean.type() != ctype )
2219 {
2220 _mean.create(mean.size(), ctype);
2221 Mat tmp = _mean.getMat();
2222 mean.convertTo(tmp, ctype);
2223 mean = tmp;
2224 }
2225 }
2226 else
2227 {
2228 ctype = std::max(CV_MAT_DEPTH(ctype >= 0 ? ctype : type), CV_32F);
2229 reduce( _src, _mean, takeRows ? 0 : 1, CV_REDUCE_AVG, ctype );
2230 mean = _mean.getMat();
2231 }
2232
2233 mulTransposed( data, _covar, ((flags & CV_COVAR_NORMAL) == 0) ^ takeRows,
2234 mean, (flags & CV_COVAR_SCALE) != 0 ? 1./nsamples : 1, ctype );
2235}

2237/****************************************************************************************\
2238* Mahalanobis *
2239\****************************************************************************************/
2240
2241double cv::Mahalanobis( InputArray _v1, InputArray _v2, InputArray _icovar )
2242{
2243 Mat v1 = _v1.getMat(), v2 = _v2.getMat(), icovar = _icovar.getMat();
2244 int type = v1.type(), depth = v1.depth();
2245 Size sz = v1.size();
2246 int i, j, len = sz.width*sz.height*v1.channels();
2247 AutoBuffer<double> buf(len);
2248 double result = 0;
2249
2250 CV_Assert( type == v2.type() && type == icovar.type() &&
2251 sz == v2.size() && len == icovar.rows && len == icovar.cols );
2252
2253 sz.width *= v1.channels();
2254 if( v1.isContinuous() && v2.isContinuous() )
2255 {
2256 sz.width *= sz.height;
2257 sz.height = 1;
2258 }
2259
2260 if( depth == CV_32F )
2261 {
2262 const float* src1 = (const float*)v1.data;
2263 const float* src2 = (const float*)v2.data;
2264 size_t step1 = v1.step/sizeof(src1[0]);
2265 size_t step2 = v2.step/sizeof(src2[0]);
2266 double* diff = buf;
2267 const float* mat = (const float*)icovar.data;
2268 size_t matstep = icovar.step/sizeof(mat[0]);
2269
2270 for( ; sz.height--; src1 += step1, src2 += step2, diff += sz.width )
2271 {
2272 for( i = 0; i < sz.width; i++ )
2273 diff[i] = src1[i] - src2[i];
2274 }
2275
2276 diff = buf;
2277 for( i = 0; i < len; i++, mat += matstep )
2278 {
2279 double row_sum = 0;
2280 j = 0;
2281 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
2282 for(; j <= len - 4; j += 4 )
2283 row_sum += diff[j]*mat[j] + diff[j+1]*mat[j+1] +
2284 diff[j+2]*mat[j+2] + diff[j+3]*mat[j+3];
2285 #endif
2286 for( ; j < len; j++ )
2287 row_sum += diff[j]*mat[j];
2288 result += row_sum * diff[i];
2289 }
2290 }
2291 else if( depth == CV_64F )
2292 {
2293 const double* src1 = (const double*)v1.data;
2294 const double* src2 = (const double*)v2.data;
2295 size_t step1 = v1.step/sizeof(src1[0]);
2296 size_t step2 = v2.step/sizeof(src2[0]);
2297 double* diff = buf;
2298 const double* mat = (const double*)icovar.data;
2299 size_t matstep = icovar.step/sizeof(mat[0]);
2300
2301 for( ; sz.height--; src1 += step1, src2 += step2, diff += sz.width )
2302 {
2303 for( i = 0; i < sz.width; i++ )
2304 diff[i] = src1[i] - src2[i];
2305 }
2306
2307 diff = buf;
2308 for( i = 0; i < len; i++, mat += matstep )
2309 {
2310 double row_sum = 0;
2311 j = 0;
2312 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
2313 for(; j <= len - 4; j += 4 )
2314 row_sum += diff[j]*mat[j] + diff[j+1]*mat[j+1] +
2315 diff[j+2]*mat[j+2] + diff[j+3]*mat[j+3];
2316 #endif
2317 for( ; j < len; j++ )
2318 row_sum += diff[j]*mat[j];
2319 result += row_sum * diff[i];
2320 }
2321 }
2322 else
2323 CV_Error( CV_StsUnsupportedFormat, "" );
2324
2325 return std::sqrt(result);
2326}
2327
2328double cv::Mahalonobis( InputArray _v1, InputArray _v2, InputArray _icovar )
2329{
2330 return Mahalanobis(_v1, _v2, _icovar);
2331}

2333/****************************************************************************************\
2334* MulTransposed *
2335\****************************************************************************************/
2336
2337namespace cv
2338{
2339
2340template<typename sT, typename dT> static void
2341MulTransposedR( const Mat& srcmat, Mat& dstmat, const Mat& deltamat, double scale )
2342{
2343 int i, j, k;
2344 const sT* src = (const sT*)srcmat.data;
2345 dT* dst = (dT*)dstmat.data;
2346 const dT* delta = (const dT*)deltamat.data;
2347 size_t srcstep = srcmat.step/sizeof(src[0]);
2348 size_t dststep = dstmat.step/sizeof(dst[0]);
2349 size_t deltastep = deltamat.rows > 1 ? deltamat.step/sizeof(delta[0]) : 0;
2350 int delta_cols = deltamat.cols;
2351 Size size = srcmat.size();
2352 dT* tdst = dst;
2353 dT* col_buf = 0;
2354 dT* delta_buf = 0;
2355 int buf_size = size.height*sizeof(dT);
2356 AutoBuffer<uchar> buf;
2357
2358 if( delta && delta_cols < size.width )
2359 {
2360 assert( delta_cols == 1 );
2361 buf_size *= 5;
2362 }
2363 buf.allocate(buf_size);
2364 col_buf = (dT*)(uchar*)buf;
2365
2366 if( delta && delta_cols < size.width )
2367 {
2368 delta_buf = col_buf + size.height;
2369 for( i = 0; i < size.height; i++ )
2370 delta_buf[i*4] = delta_buf[i*4+1] =
2371 delta_buf[i*4+2] = delta_buf[i*4+3] = delta[i*deltastep];
2372 delta = delta_buf;
2373 deltastep = deltastep ? 4 : 0;
2374 }
2375
2376 if( !delta )
2377 for( i = 0; i < size.width; i++, tdst += dststep )
2378 {
2379 for( k = 0; k < size.height; k++ )
2380 col_buf[k] = src[k*srcstep+i];
2381
2382 for( j = i; j <= size.width - 4; j += 4 )
2383 {
2384 double s0 = 0, s1 = 0, s2 = 0, s3 = 0;
2385 const sT *tsrc = src + j;
2386
2387 for( k = 0; k < size.height; k++, tsrc += srcstep )
2388 {
2389 double a = col_buf[k];
2390 s0 += a * tsrc[0];
2391 s1 += a * tsrc[1];
2392 s2 += a * tsrc[2];
2393 s3 += a * tsrc[3];
2394 }
2395
2396 tdst[j] = (dT)(s0*scale);
2397 tdst[j+1] = (dT)(s1*scale);
2398 tdst[j+2] = (dT)(s2*scale);
2399 tdst[j+3] = (dT)(s3*scale);
2400 }
2401
2402 for( ; j < size.width; j++ )
2403 {
2404 double s0 = 0;
2405 const sT *tsrc = src + j;
2406
2407 for( k = 0; k < size.height; k++, tsrc += srcstep )
2408 s0 += (double)col_buf[k] * tsrc[0];
2409
2410 tdst[j] = (dT)(s0*scale);
2411 }
2412 }
2413 else
2414 for( i = 0; i < size.width; i++, tdst += dststep )
2415 {
2416 if( !delta_buf )
2417 for( k = 0; k < size.height; k++ )
2418 col_buf[k] = src[k*srcstep+i] - delta[k*deltastep+i];
2419 else
2420 for( k = 0; k < size.height; k++ )
2421 col_buf[k] = src[k*srcstep+i] - delta_buf[k*deltastep];
2422
2423 for( j = i; j <= size.width - 4; j += 4 )
2424 {
2425 double s0 = 0, s1 = 0, s2 = 0, s3 = 0;
2426 const sT *tsrc = src + j;
2427 const dT *d = delta_buf ? delta_buf : delta + j;
2428
2429 for( k = 0; k < size.height; k++, tsrc+=srcstep, d+=deltastep )
2430 {
2431 double a = col_buf[k];
2432 s0 += a * (tsrc[0] - d[0]);
2433 s1 += a * (tsrc[1] - d[1]);
2434 s2 += a * (tsrc[2] - d[2]);
2435 s3 += a * (tsrc[3] - d[3]);
2436 }
2437
2438 tdst[j] = (dT)(s0*scale);
2439 tdst[j+1] = (dT)(s1*scale);
2440 tdst[j+2] = (dT)(s2*scale);
2441 tdst[j+3] = (dT)(s3*scale);
2442 }
2443
2444 for( ; j < size.width; j++ )
2445 {
2446 double s0 = 0;
2447 const sT *tsrc = src + j;
2448 const dT *d = delta_buf ? delta_buf : delta + j;
2449
2450 for( k = 0; k < size.height; k++, tsrc+=srcstep, d+=deltastep )
2451 s0 += (double)col_buf[k] * (tsrc[0] - d[0]);
2452
2453 tdst[j] = (dT)(s0*scale);
2454 }
2455 }
2456}
2457
2458
2459template<typename sT, typename dT> static void
2460MulTransposedL( const Mat& srcmat, Mat& dstmat, const Mat& deltamat, double scale )
2461{
2462 int i, j, k;
2463 const sT* src = (const sT*)srcmat.data;
2464 dT* dst = (dT*)dstmat.data;
2465 const dT* delta = (const dT*)deltamat.data;
2466 size_t srcstep = srcmat.step/sizeof(src[0]);
2467 size_t dststep = dstmat.step/sizeof(dst[0]);
2468 size_t deltastep = deltamat.rows > 1 ? deltamat.step/sizeof(delta[0]) : 0;
2469 int delta_cols = deltamat.cols;
2470 Size size = srcmat.size();
2471 dT* tdst = dst;
2472
2473 if( !delta )
2474 for( i = 0; i < size.height; i++, tdst += dststep )
2475 for( j = i; j < size.height; j++ )
2476 {
2477 double s = 0;
2478 const sT *tsrc1 = src + i*srcstep;
2479 const sT *tsrc2 = src + j*srcstep;
2480
2481 for( k = 0; k <= size.width - 4; k += 4 )
2482 s += (double)tsrc1[k]*tsrc2[k] + (double)tsrc1[k+1]*tsrc2[k+1] +
2483 (double)tsrc1[k+2]*tsrc2[k+2] + (double)tsrc1[k+3]*tsrc2[k+3];
2484 for( ; k < size.width; k++ )
2485 s += (double)tsrc1[k] * tsrc2[k];
2486 tdst[j] = (dT)(s*scale);
2487 }
2488 else
2489 {
2490 dT delta_buf[4];
2491 int delta_shift = delta_cols == size.width ? 4 : 0;
2492 AutoBuffer<uchar> buf(size.width*sizeof(dT));
2493 dT* row_buf = (dT*)(uchar*)buf;
2494
2495 for( i = 0; i < size.height; i++, tdst += dststep )
2496 {
2497 const sT *tsrc1 = src + i*srcstep;
2498 const dT *tdelta1 = delta + i*deltastep;
2499
2500 if( delta_cols < size.width )
2501 for( k = 0; k < size.width; k++ )
2502 row_buf[k] = tsrc1[k] - tdelta1[0];
2503 else
2504 for( k = 0; k < size.width; k++ )
2505 row_buf[k] = tsrc1[k] - tdelta1[k];
2506
2507 for( j = i; j < size.height; j++ )
2508 {
2509 double s = 0;
2510 const sT *tsrc2 = src + j*srcstep;
2511 const dT *tdelta2 = delta + j*deltastep;
2512 if( delta_cols < size.width )
2513 {
2514 delta_buf[0] = delta_buf[1] =
2515 delta_buf[2] = delta_buf[3] = tdelta2[0];
2516 tdelta2 = delta_buf;
2517 }
2518 for( k = 0; k <= size.width-4; k += 4, tdelta2 += delta_shift )
2519 s += (double)row_buf[k]*(tsrc2[k] - tdelta2[0]) +
2520 (double)row_buf[k+1]*(tsrc2[k+1] - tdelta2[1]) +
2521 (double)row_buf[k+2]*(tsrc2[k+2] - tdelta2[2]) +
2522 (double)row_buf[k+3]*(tsrc2[k+3] - tdelta2[3]);
2523 for( ; k < size.width; k++, tdelta2++ )
2524 s += (double)row_buf[k]*(tsrc2[k] - tdelta2[0]);
2525 tdst[j] = (dT)(s*scale);
2526 }
2527 }
2528 }
2529}
2530
2531typedef void (*MulTransposedFunc)(const Mat& src, Mat& dst, const Mat& delta, double scale);
2532
2533}
2534
2535void cv::mulTransposed( InputArray _src, OutputArray _dst, bool ata,
2536 InputArray _delta, double scale, int dtype )
2537{
2538 Mat src = _src.getMat(), delta = _delta.getMat();
2539 const int gemm_level = 100; // boundary above which GEMM is faster.
2540 int stype = src.type();
2541 dtype = std::max(std::max(CV_MAT_DEPTH(dtype >= 0 ? dtype : stype), delta.depth()), CV_32F);
2542 CV_Assert( src.channels() == 1 );
2543
2544 if( delta.data )
2545 {
2546 CV_Assert( delta.channels() == 1 &&
2547 (delta.rows == src.rows || delta.rows == 1) &&
2548 (delta.cols == src.cols || delta.cols == 1));
2549 if( delta.type() != dtype )
2550 delta.convertTo(delta, dtype);
2551 }
2552
2553 int dsize = ata ? src.cols : src.rows;
2554 _dst.create( dsize, dsize, dtype );
2555 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
2556
2557 if( src.data == dst.data || (stype == dtype &&
2558 (dst.cols >= gemm_level && dst.rows >= gemm_level &&
2559 src.cols >= gemm_level && src.rows >= gemm_level)))
2560 {
2561 Mat src2;
2562 const Mat* tsrc = &src;
2563 if( delta.data )
2564 {
2565 if( delta.size() == src.size() )
2566 subtract( src, delta, src2 );
2567 else
2568 {
2569 repeat(delta, src.rows/delta.rows, src.cols/delta.cols, src2);
2570 subtract( src, src2, src2 );
2571 }
2572 tsrc = &src2;
2573 }
2574 gemm( *tsrc, *tsrc, scale, Mat(), 0, dst, ata ? GEMM_1_T : GEMM_2_T );
2575 }
2576 else
2577 {
2578 MulTransposedFunc func = 0;
2579 if(stype == CV_8U && dtype == CV_32F)
2580 {
2581 if(ata)
2582 func = MulTransposedR<uchar,float>;
2583 else
2584 func = MulTransposedL<uchar,float>;
2585 }
2586 else if(stype == CV_8U && dtype == CV_64F)
2587 {
2588 if(ata)
2589 func = MulTransposedR<uchar,double>;
2590 else
2591 func = MulTransposedL<uchar,double>;
2592 }
2593 else if(stype == CV_16U && dtype == CV_32F)
2594 {
2595 if(ata)
2596 func = MulTransposedR<ushort,float>;
2597 else
2598 func = MulTransposedL<ushort,float>;
2599 }
2600 else if(stype == CV_16U && dtype == CV_64F)
2601 {
2602 if(ata)
2603 func = MulTransposedR<ushort,double>;
2604 else
2605 func = MulTransposedL<ushort,double>;
2606 }
2607 else if(stype == CV_16S && dtype == CV_32F)
2608 {
2609 if(ata)
2610 func = MulTransposedR<short,float>;
2611 else
2612 func = MulTransposedL<short,float>;
2613 }
2614 else if(stype == CV_16S && dtype == CV_64F)
2615 {
2616 if(ata)
2617 func = MulTransposedR<short,double>;
2618 else
2619 func = MulTransposedL<short,double>;
2620 }
2621 else if(stype == CV_32F && dtype == CV_32F)
2622 {
2623 if(ata)
2624 func = MulTransposedR<float,float>;
2625 else
2626 func = MulTransposedL<float,float>;
2627 }
2628 else if(stype == CV_32F && dtype == CV_64F)
2629 {
2630 if(ata)
2631 func = MulTransposedR<float,double>;
2632 else
2633 func = MulTransposedL<float,double>;
2634 }
2635 else if(stype == CV_64F && dtype == CV_64F)
2636 {
2637 if(ata)
2638 func = MulTransposedR<double,double>;
2639 else
2640 func = MulTransposedL<double,double>;
2641 }
2642 if( !func )
2643 CV_Error( CV_StsUnsupportedFormat, "" );
2644
2645 func( src, dst, delta, scale );
2646 completeSymm( dst, false );
2647 }
2648}

2650/****************************************************************************************\
2651* Dot Product *
2652\****************************************************************************************/
2653
2654namespace cv
2655{
2656
2657template<typename T> double
2658dotProd_(const T* src1, const T* src2, int len)
2659{
2660 int i = 0;
2661 double result = 0;
2662 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
2663 for( ; i <= len - 4; i += 4 )
2664 result += (double)src1[i]*src2[i] + (double)src1[i+1]*src2[i+1] +
2665 (double)src1[i+2]*src2[i+2] + (double)src1[i+3]*src2[i+3];
2666 #endif
2667 for( ; i < len; i++ )
2668 result += (double)src1[i]*src2[i];
2669
2670 return result;
2671}
2672
2673
2674static double dotProd_8u(const uchar* src1, const uchar* src2, int len)
2675{
2676 double r = 0;
2677#if ARITHM_USE_IPP
2678 ippiDotProd_8u64f_C1R(src1, (int)(len*sizeof(src1[0])),
2679 src2, (int)(len*sizeof(src2[0])),
2680 ippiSize(len, 1), &r);
2681 return r;
2682#else
2683 int i = 0;
2684
2685#if CV_SSE2
2686 if( USE_SSE2 )
2687 {
2688 int j, len0 = len & -4, blockSize0 = (1 << 13), blockSize;
2689 __m128i z = _mm_setzero_si128();
2690 while( i < len0 )
2691 {
2692 blockSize = std::min(len0 - i, blockSize0);
2693 __m128i s = _mm_setzero_si128();
2694 j = 0;
2695 for( ; j <= blockSize - 16; j += 16 )
2696 {
2697 __m128i b0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(src1 + j));
2698 __m128i b1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(src2 + j));
2699 __m128i s0, s1, s2, s3;
2700 s0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(b0, z);
2701 s2 = _mm_unpackhi_epi8(b0, z);
2702 s1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(b1, z);
2703 s3 = _mm_unpackhi_epi8(b1, z);
2704 s0 = _mm_madd_epi16(s0, s1);
2705 s2 = _mm_madd_epi16(s2, s3);
2706 s = _mm_add_epi32(s, s0);
2707 s = _mm_add_epi32(s, s2);
2708 }
2709
2710 for( ; j < blockSize; j += 4 )
2711 {
2712 __m128i s0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(const int*)(src1 + j)), z);
2713 __m128i s1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(const int*)(src2 + j)), z);
2714 s0 = _mm_madd_epi16(s0, s1);
2715 s = _mm_add_epi32(s, s0);
2716 }
2717 CV_DECL_ALIGNED(16) int buf[4];
2718 _mm_store_si128((__m128i*)buf, s);
2719 r += buf[0] + buf[1] + buf[2] + buf[3];
2720
2721 src1 += blockSize;
2722 src2 += blockSize;
2723 i += blockSize;
2724 }
2725 }
2726#endif
2727 return r + dotProd_(src1, src2, len - i);
2728#endif
2729}
2730
2731
2732static double dotProd_8s(const schar* src1, const schar* src2, int len)
2733{
2734 return dotProd_(src1, src2, len);
2735}
2736
2737static double dotProd_16u(const ushort* src1, const ushort* src2, int len)
2738{
2739 double r = 0;
2740 IF_IPP(ippiDotProd_16u64f_C1R(src1, (int)(len*sizeof(src1[0])),
2741 src2, (int)(len*sizeof(src2[0])),
2742 ippiSize(len, 1), &r),
2743 r = dotProd_(src1, src2, len));
2744 return r;
2745}

2751 src2, (int)(len*sizeof(src2[0])),
2752 ippiSize(len, 1), &r),
2753 r = dotProd_(src1, src2, len));

2783
2784typedef double (*DotProdFunc)(const uchar* src1, const uchar* src2, int len);
2785
2786static DotProdFunc getDotProdFunc(int depth)
2787{
2788 static DotProdFunc dotProdTab[] =
2789 {
2790 (DotProdFunc)GET_OPTIMIZED(dotProd_8u), (DotProdFunc)GET_OPTIMIZED(dotProd_8s),
2791 (DotProdFunc)dotProd_16u, (DotProdFunc)dotProd_16s,
2792 (DotProdFunc)dotProd_32s, (DotProdFunc)GET_OPTIMIZED(dotProd_32f),
2793 (DotProdFunc)dotProd_64f, 0
2794 };
2795
2796 return dotProdTab[depth];
2797}
2798
2799double Mat::dot(InputArray _mat) const
2800{
2801 Mat mat = _mat.getMat();
2802 int cn = channels();
2803 DotProdFunc func = getDotProdFunc(depth());
2804 CV_Assert( mat.type() == type() && mat.size == size && func != 0 );
2805
2806 if( isContinuous() && mat.isContinuous() )
2807 {
2808 size_t len = total()*cn;
2809 if( len == (size_t)(int)len )
2810 return func(data, mat.data, (int)len);
2811 }
2812
2813 const Mat* arrays[] = {this, &mat, 0};
2814 uchar* ptrs[2];
2815 NAryMatIterator it(arrays, ptrs);
2816 int len = (int)(it.size*cn);
2817 double r = 0;
2818
2819 for( size_t i = 0; i < it.nplanes; i++, ++it )
2820 r += func( ptrs[0], ptrs[1], len );
2821
2822 return r;
2823}
