2825/****************************************************************************************\
2826* PCA *
2827\****************************************************************************************/
2828
2829PCA::PCA() {}
2830
2831PCA::PCA(InputArray data, InputArray _mean, int flags, int maxComponents)
2832{
2833 operator()(data, _mean, flags, maxComponents);
2834}
2835
2836PCA::PCA(InputArray data, InputArray _mean, int flags, double retainedVariance)
2837{
2838 computeVar(data, _mean, flags, retainedVariance);
2839}
2840
2841PCA& PCA::operator()(InputArray _data, InputArray __mean, int flags, int maxComponents)
2842{
2843 Mat data = _data.getMat(), _mean = __mean.getMat();
2844 int covar_flags = CV_COVAR_SCALE;
2845 int i, len, in_count;
2846 Size mean_sz;
2847
2848 CV_Assert( data.channels() == 1 );
2849 if( flags & CV_PCA_DATA_AS_COL )
2850 {
2851 len = data.rows;
2852 in_count = data.cols;
2853 covar_flags |= CV_COVAR_COLS;
2854 mean_sz = Size(1, len);
2855 }
2856 else
2857 {
2858 len = data.cols;
2859 in_count = data.rows;
2860 covar_flags |= CV_COVAR_ROWS;
2861 mean_sz = Size(len, 1);
2862 }
2863
2864 int count = std::min(len, in_count), out_count = count;
2865 if( maxComponents > 0 )
2866 out_count = std::min(count, maxComponents);
2867
2868 // "scrambled" way to compute PCA (when cols(A)>rows(A)):
2869 // B = A'A; B*x=b*x; C = AA'; C*y=c*y -> AA'*y=c*y -> A'A*(A'*y)=c*(A'*y) -> c = b, x=A'*y
2870 if( len <= in_count )
2871 covar_flags |= CV_COVAR_NORMAL;
2872
2873 int ctype = std::max(CV_32F, data.depth());
2874 mean.create( mean_sz, ctype );
2875
2876 Mat covar( count, count, ctype );
2877
2878 if( _mean.data )
2879 {
2880 CV_Assert( _mean.size() == mean_sz );
2881 _mean.convertTo(mean, ctype);
2882 covar_flags |= CV_COVAR_USE_AVG;
2883 }
2884
2885 calcCovarMatrix( data, covar, mean, covar_flags, ctype );
2886 eigen( covar, eigenvalues, eigenvectors );
2887
2888 if( !(covar_flags & CV_COVAR_NORMAL) )
2889 {
2890 // CV_PCA_DATA_AS_ROW: cols(A)>rows(A). x=A'*y -> x'=y'*A
2891 // CV_PCA_DATA_AS_COL: rows(A)>cols(A). x=A''*y -> x'=y'*A'
2892 Mat tmp_data, tmp_mean = repeat(mean, data.rows/mean.rows, data.cols/mean.cols);
2893 if( data.type() != ctype || tmp_mean.data == mean.data )
2894 {
2895 data.convertTo( tmp_data, ctype );
2896 subtract( tmp_data, tmp_mean, tmp_data );
2897 }
2898 else
2899 {
2900 subtract( data, tmp_mean, tmp_mean );
2901 tmp_data = tmp_mean;
2902 }
2903
2904 Mat evects1(count, len, ctype);
2905 gemm( eigenvectors, tmp_data, 1, Mat(), 0, evects1,
2906 (flags & CV_PCA_DATA_AS_COL) ? CV_GEMM_B_T : 0);
2907 eigenvectors = evects1;
2908
2909 // normalize eigenvectors
2910 for( i = 0; i < out_count; i++ )
2911 {
2912 Mat vec = eigenvectors.row(i);
2913 normalize(vec, vec);
2914 }
2915 }
2916
2917 if( count > out_count )
2918 {
2919 // use clone() to physically copy the data and thus deallocate the original matrices
2920 eigenvalues = eigenvalues.rowRange(0,out_count).clone();
2921 eigenvectors = eigenvectors.rowRange(0,out_count).clone();
2922 }
2923 return *this;
2924}
2925
2926template <typename T>
2927int computeCumulativeEnergy(const Mat& eigenvalues, double retainedVariance)
2928{
2929 CV_DbgAssert( eigenvalues.type() == DataType<T>::type );
2930
2931 Mat g(eigenvalues.size(), DataType<T>::type);
2932
2933 for(int ig = 0; ig < g.rows; ig++)
2934 {
2935 g.at<T>(ig, 0) = 0;
2936 for(int im = 0; im <= ig; im++)
2937 {
2938 g.at<T>(ig,0) += eigenvalues.at<T>(im,0);
2939 }
2940 }
2941
2942 int L;
2943
2944 for(L = 0; L < eigenvalues.rows; L++)
2945 {
2946 double energy = g.at<T>(L, 0) / g.at<T>(g.rows - 1, 0);
2947 if(energy > retainedVariance)
2948 break;
2949 }
2950
2951 L = std::max(2, L);
2952
2953 return L;
2954}
2955
2956PCA& PCA::computeVar(InputArray _data, InputArray __mean, int flags, double retainedVariance)
2957{
2958 Mat data = _data.getMat(), _mean = __mean.getMat();
2959 int covar_flags = CV_COVAR_SCALE;
2960 int i, len, in_count;
2961 Size mean_sz;
2962
2963 CV_Assert( data.channels() == 1 );
2964 if( flags & CV_PCA_DATA_AS_COL )
2965 {
2966 len = data.rows;
2967 in_count = data.cols;
2968 covar_flags |= CV_COVAR_COLS;
2969 mean_sz = Size(1, len);
2970 }
2971 else
2972 {
2973 len = data.cols;
2974 in_count = data.rows;
2975 covar_flags |= CV_COVAR_ROWS;
2976 mean_sz = Size(len, 1);
2977 }
2978
2979 CV_Assert( retainedVariance > 0 && retainedVariance <= 1 );
2980
2981 int count = std::min(len, in_count);
2982
2983 // "scrambled" way to compute PCA (when cols(A)>rows(A)):
2984 // B = A'A; B*x=b*x; C = AA'; C*y=c*y -> AA'*y=c*y -> A'A*(A'*y)=c*(A'*y) -> c = b, x=A'*y
2985 if( len <= in_count )
2986 covar_flags |= CV_COVAR_NORMAL;
2987
2988 int ctype = std::max(CV_32F, data.depth());
2989 mean.create( mean_sz, ctype );
2990
2991 Mat covar( count, count, ctype );
2992
2993 if( _mean.data )
2994 {
2995 CV_Assert( _mean.size() == mean_sz );
2996 _mean.convertTo(mean, ctype);
2997 }
2998
2999 calcCovarMatrix( data, covar, mean, covar_flags, ctype );
3000 eigen( covar, eigenvalues, eigenvectors );
3001
3002 if( !(covar_flags & CV_COVAR_NORMAL) )
3003 {
3004 // CV_PCA_DATA_AS_ROW: cols(A)>rows(A). x=A'*y -> x'=y'*A
3005 // CV_PCA_DATA_AS_COL: rows(A)>cols(A). x=A''*y -> x'=y'*A'
3006 Mat tmp_data, tmp_mean = repeat(mean, data.rows/mean.rows, data.cols/mean.cols);
3007 if( data.type() != ctype || tmp_mean.data == mean.data )
3008 {
3009 data.convertTo( tmp_data, ctype );
3010 subtract( tmp_data, tmp_mean, tmp_data );
3011 }
3012 else
3013 {
3014 subtract( data, tmp_mean, tmp_mean );
3015 tmp_data = tmp_mean;
3016 }
3017
3018 Mat evects1(count, len, ctype);
3019 gemm( eigenvectors, tmp_data, 1, Mat(), 0, evects1,
3020 (flags & CV_PCA_DATA_AS_COL) ? CV_GEMM_B_T : 0);
3021 eigenvectors = evects1;
3022
3023 // normalize all eigenvectors
3024 for( i = 0; i < eigenvectors.rows; i++ )
3025 {
3026 Mat vec = eigenvectors.row(i);
3027 normalize(vec, vec);
3028 }
3029 }
3030
3031 // compute the cumulative energy content for each eigenvector
3032 int L;
3033 if (ctype == CV_32F)
3034 L = computeCumulativeEnergy<float>(eigenvalues, retainedVariance);
3035 else
3036 L = computeCumulativeEnergy<double>(eigenvalues, retainedVariance);
3037
3038 // use clone() to physically copy the data and thus deallocate the original matrices
3039 eigenvalues = eigenvalues.rowRange(0,L).clone();
3040 eigenvectors = eigenvectors.rowRange(0,L).clone();
3041
3042 return *this;
3043}
3044
3045void PCA::project(InputArray _data, OutputArray result) const
3046{
3047 Mat data = _data.getMat();
3048 CV_Assert( mean.data && eigenvectors.data &&
3049 ((mean.rows == 1 && mean.cols == data.cols) || (mean.cols == 1 && mean.rows == data.rows)));
3050 Mat tmp_data, tmp_mean = repeat(mean, data.rows/mean.rows, data.cols/mean.cols);
3051 int ctype = mean.type();
3052 if( data.type() != ctype || tmp_mean.data == mean.data )
3053 {
3054 data.convertTo( tmp_data, ctype );
3055 subtract( tmp_data, tmp_mean, tmp_data );
3056 }
3057 else
3058 {
3059 subtract( data, tmp_mean, tmp_mean );
3060 tmp_data = tmp_mean;
3061 }
3062 if( mean.rows == 1 )
3063 gemm( tmp_data, eigenvectors, 1, Mat(), 0, result, GEMM_2_T );
3064 else
3065 gemm( eigenvectors, tmp_data, 1, Mat(), 0, result, 0 );
3066}
3067
3068Mat PCA::project(InputArray data) const
3069{
3070 Mat result;
3071 project(data, result);
3072 return result;
3073}
3074
3075void PCA::backProject(InputArray _data, OutputArray result) const
3076{
3077 Mat data = _data.getMat();
3078 CV_Assert( mean.data && eigenvectors.data &&
3079 ((mean.rows == 1 && eigenvectors.rows == data.cols) ||
3080 (mean.cols == 1 && eigenvectors.rows == data.rows)));
3081
3082 Mat tmp_data, tmp_mean;
3083 data.convertTo(tmp_data, mean.type());
3084 if( mean.rows == 1 )
3085 {
3086 tmp_mean = repeat(mean, data.rows, 1);
3087 gemm( tmp_data, eigenvectors, 1, tmp_mean, 1, result, 0 );
3088 }
3089 else
3090 {
3091 tmp_mean = repeat(mean, 1, data.cols);
3092 gemm( eigenvectors, tmp_data, 1, tmp_mean, 1, result, GEMM_1_T );
3093 }
3094}
3095
3096Mat PCA::backProject(InputArray data) const
3097{
3098 Mat result;
3099 backProject(data, result);
3100 return result;
3101}

3103}

3119 pca.mean.copyTo(mean);

3146CV_IMPL void cvGEMM( const CvArr* Aarr, const CvArr* Barr, double alpha,
3147 const CvArr* Carr, double beta, CvArr* Darr, int flags )
3148{
3149 cv::Mat A = cv::cvarrToMat(Aarr), B = cv::cvarrToMat(Barr);
3150 cv::Mat C, D = cv::cvarrToMat(Darr);
3151
3152 if( Carr )
3153 C = cv::cvarrToMat(Carr);
3154
3155 CV_Assert( (D.rows == ((flags & CV_GEMM_A_T) == 0 ? A.rows : A.cols)) &&
3156 (D.cols == ((flags & CV_GEMM_B_T) == 0 ? B.cols : B.rows)) &&
3157 D.type() == A.type() );
3158
3159 gemm( A, B, alpha, C, beta, D, flags );
3160}

3168

3172 _m(m.rows, m.cols + 1, m.type()), m1 = _m.colRange(0,m.cols), v1 = _m.col(m.cols);
3173 m.convertTo(m1, m1.type());
3174 v.convertTo(v1, v1.type());
3175 m = _m;
3176 }
3177
3178 CV_Assert( dst.depth() == src.depth() && dst.channels() == m.rows );
3179 cv::transform( src, dst, m );
3180}

3203CV_IMPL void
3204cvCalcCovarMatrix( const CvArr** vecarr, int count,
3205 CvArr* covarr, CvArr* avgarr, int flags )
3206{
3207 cv::Mat cov0 = cv::cvarrToMat(covarr), cov = cov0, mean0, mean;
3208 CV_Assert( vecarr != 0 && count >= 1 );
3209
3210 if( avgarr )
3211 mean = mean0 = cv::cvarrToMat(avgarr);
3212
3213 if( (flags & CV_COVAR_COLS) != 0 || (flags & CV_COVAR_ROWS) != 0 )
3214 {
3215
3216 cv::Mat data = cv::cvarrToMat(vecarr[0]);
3217 cv::calcCovarMatrix( data, cov, mean, flags, cov.type() );
3218 }
3219 else
3220 {
3221 std::vector<cv::Mat> data(count);
3222 for( int i = 0; i < count; i++ )
3223 data[i] = cv::cvarrToMat(vecarr[i]);
3224 cv::calcCovarMatrix( &data[0], count, cov, mean, flags, cov.type() );
3225 }
3226
3227 if( mean.data != mean0.data && mean0.data )
3228 mean.convertTo(mean0, mean0.type());
3229
3230 if( cov.data != cov0.data )
3231 cov.convertTo(cov0, cov0.type());
3232}

3259
3260CV_IMPL void
3261cvCalcPCA( const CvArr* data_arr, CvArr* avg_arr, CvArr* eigenvals, CvArr* eigenvects, int flags )
3262{
3263 cv::Mat data = cv::cvarrToMat(data_arr), mean0 = cv::cvarrToMat(avg_arr);
3264 cv::Mat evals0 = cv::cvarrToMat(eigenvals), evects0 = cv::cvarrToMat(eigenvects);
3265 cv::Mat mean = mean0, evals = evals0, evects = evects0;
3266
3267 cv::PCA pca;
3268 pca.mean = mean;
3269 pca.eigenvalues = evals;
3270 pca.eigenvectors = evects;
3271
3272 pca(data, (flags & CV_PCA_USE_AVG) ? mean : cv::Mat(),
3273 flags, evals.data ? evals.rows + evals.cols - 1 : 0);
3274
3275 if( pca.mean.size() == mean.size() )
3276 pca.mean.convertTo( mean, mean.type() );
3277 else
3278 {
3279 cv::Mat temp; pca.mean.convertTo( temp, mean.type() );
3280 transpose( temp, mean );
3281 }
3282
3283 evals = pca.eigenvalues;
3284 evects = pca.eigenvectors;
3285 int ecount0 = evals0.cols + evals0.rows - 1;
3286 int ecount = evals.cols + evals.rows - 1;
3287
3288 CV_Assert( (evals0.cols == 1 || evals0.rows == 1) &&
3289 ecount0 <= ecount &&
3290 evects0.cols == evects.cols &&
3291 evects0.rows == ecount0 );
3292
3293 cv::Mat temp = evals0;
3294 if( evals.rows == 1 )
3295 evals.colRange(0, ecount0).convertTo(temp, evals0.type());
3296 else
3297 evals.rowRange(0, ecount0).convertTo(temp, evals0.type());
3298 if( temp.data != evals0.data )
3299 transpose(temp, evals0);
3300 evects.rowRange(0, ecount0).convertTo( evects0, evects0.type() );
3301
3302 // otherwise some datatype's or size's were incorrect, so the output arrays have been reallocated
3303 CV_Assert( mean0.data == mean.data );
3304}
3305
3306
3307CV_IMPL void
3308cvProjectPCA( const CvArr* data_arr, const CvArr* avg_arr,
3309 const CvArr* eigenvects, CvArr* result_arr )
3310{
3311 cv::Mat data = cv::cvarrToMat(data_arr), mean = cv::cvarrToMat(avg_arr);
3312 cv::Mat evects = cv::cvarrToMat(eigenvects), dst0 = cv::cvarrToMat(result_arr), dst = dst0;
3313
3314 cv::PCA pca;
3315 pca.mean = mean;
3316 int n;
3317 if( mean.rows == 1 )
3318 {
3319 CV_Assert(dst.cols <= evects.rows && dst.rows == data.rows);
3320 n = dst.cols;
3321 }
3322 else
3323 {
3324 CV_Assert(dst.rows <= evects.rows && dst.cols == data.cols);
3325 n = dst.rows;
3326 }
3327 pca.eigenvectors = evects.rowRange(0, n);
3328
3329 cv::Mat result = pca.project(data);
3330 if( result.cols != dst.cols )
3331 result = result.reshape(1, 1);
3332 result.convertTo(dst, dst.type());
3333
3334 CV_Assert(dst0.data == dst.data);
3335}

3338CV_IMPL void
3339cvBackProjectPCA( const CvArr* proj_arr, const CvArr* avg_arr,
3340 const CvArr* eigenvects, CvArr* result_arr )
3341{
3342 cv::Mat data = cv::cvarrToMat(proj_arr), mean = cv::cvarrToMat(avg_arr);
3343 cv::Mat evects = cv::cvarrToMat(eigenvects), dst0 = cv::cvarrToMat(result_arr), dst = dst0;
3344
3345 cv::PCA pca;
3346 pca.mean = mean;
3347 int n;
3348 if( mean.rows == 1 )
3349 {
3350 CV_Assert(data.cols <= evects.rows && dst.rows == data.rows);
3351 n = data.cols;
3352 }
3353 else
3354 {
3355 CV_Assert(data.rows <= evects.rows && dst.cols == data.cols);
3356 n = data.rows;
3357 }
3358 pca.eigenvectors = evects.rowRange(0, n);
3359
3360 cv::Mat result = pca.backProject(data);
3361 result.convertTo(dst, dst.type());
3362
3363 CV_Assert(dst0.data == dst.data);
3364}
